GE09ram_01_u:3: 1.001.002a ko nv asmin sāmprataṃ loke guṇavān kaś ca vīryavān
GE09ram_01_u:4: 1.001.002c dharmajñaś ca kṛtajñaś ca satyavākyo dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:5: 1.001.003a cāritreṇa ca ko yuktaḥ sarvabhūteṣu ko hitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:6: 1.001.003c vidvān kaḥ kaḥ samarthaś ca kaś caikapriyadarśanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:8: 1.001.004c kasya bibhyati devāś ca jātaroṣasya saṃyuge
GE09ram_01_u:9: 1.001.005a etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE09ram_01_u:10: 1.001.005c maharṣe tvaṃ samartho 'si jñātum evaṃvidhaṃ naram
GE09ram_01_u:11: 1.001.006a śrutvā caitat trilokajño vālmīker nārado vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:12: 1.001.006c śrūyatām iti cāmantrya prahṛṣṭo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:13: 1.001.007a bahavo durlabhāś caiva ye tvayā kīrtitā guṇāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:14: 1.001.007c mune vakṣyāmy ahaṃ buddhvā tair yuktaḥ śrūyatāṃ naraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:23: 1.001.012a dharmajñaḥ satyasaṃdhaś ca prajānāṃ ca hite rataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:32: 1.001.016c samudra iva gāmbhīrye dhairyeṇa himavān iva
GE09ram_01_u:35: 1.001.018a dhanadena samas tyāge satye dharma ivāparaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:37: 1.001.019a jyeṣṭhaṃ śreṣṭhaguṇair yuktaṃ priyaṃ daśarathaḥ sutam
GE09ram_01_u:40: 1.001.020c pūrvaṃ dattavarā devī varam enam ayācata
GE09ram_01_u:43: 1.001.021c vivāsayām āsa sutaṃ rāmaṃ daśarathaḥ priyam
GE09ram_01_u:44: 1.001.022a sa jagāma vanaṃ vīraḥ pratijñām anupālayan
GE09ram_01_u:46: 1.001.023a taṃ vrajantaṃ priyo bhrātā lakṣmaṇo 'nujagāma ha
GE09ram_01_u:49: 1.001.024c sītāpy anugatā rāmaṃ śaśinaṃ rohiṇī yathā
GE09ram_01_u:50: 1.001.025a paurair anugato dūraṃ pitrā daśarathena ca
GE09ram_01_u:52: 1.001.026a te vanena vanaṃ gatvā nadīs tīrtvā bahūdakāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:54: 1.001.027a ramyam āvasathaṃ kṛtvā ramamāṇā vane trayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:57: 1.001.028c rājā daśarathaḥ svargaṃ jagāma vilapan sutam
GE09ram_01_u:58: 1.001.029a mṛte tu tasmin bharato vasiṣṭhapramukhair dvijaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:61: 1.001.030a pāduke cāsya rājyāya nyāsaṃ dattvā punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:65: 1.001.032a rāmas tu punar ālakṣya nāgarasya janasya ca
GE09ram_01_u:67: 1.001.033a virādhaṃ rākṣasaṃ hatvā śarabhaṅgaṃ dadarśa ha
GE09ram_01_u:68: 1.001.033c sutīkṣṇaṃ cāpy agastyaṃ ca agastya bhrātaraṃ tathā
GE09ram_01_u:71: 1.001.035a vasatas tasya rāmasya vane vanacaraiḥ saha
GE09ram_01_u:76: 1.001.037c kharaṃ triśirasaṃ caiva dūṣaṇaṃ caiva rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_01_u:77: 1.001.038a nijaghāna raṇe rāmas teṣāṃ caiva padānugān
GE09ram_01_u:80: 1.001.039c sahāyaṃ varayām āsa mārīcaṃ nāma rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_01_u:82: 1.001.040c na virodho balavatā kṣamo rāvaṇa tena te
GE09ram_01_u:83: 1.001.041a anādṛtya tu tad vākyaṃ rāvaṇaḥ kālacoditaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:86: 1.001.042c jahāra bhāryāṃ rāmasya gṛdhraṃ hatvā jaṭāyuṣam
GE09ram_01_u:87: 1.001.043a gṛdhraṃ ca nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛtāṃ śrutvā ca maithilīm
GE09ram_01_u:89: 1.001.044a tatas tenaiva śokena gṛdhraṃ dagdhvā jaṭāyuṣam
GE09ram_01_u:90: 1.001.044c mārgamāṇo vane sītāṃ rākṣasaṃ saṃdadarśa ha
GE09ram_01_u:92: 1.001.045c taṃ nihatya mahābāhur dadāha svargataś ca saḥ
GE09ram_01_u:93: 1.001.046a sa cāsya kathayām āsa śabarīṃ dharmacāriṇīm
GE09ram_01_u:99: 1.001.048c sugrīvāya ca tat sarvaṃ śaṃsad rāmo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:102: 1.001.049e vālinaś ca balaṃ tatra kathayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:103: 1.001.050a pratijñātaṃ ca rāmeṇa tadā vālivadhaṃ prati
GE09ram_01_u:104: 1.001.050c sugrīvaḥ śaṅkitaś cāsīn nityaṃ vīryeṇa rāghave
GE09ram_01_u:105: 1.001.051a rāghavaḥ pratyayārthaṃ tu dundubheḥ kāyam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:107: 1.001.052a bibheda ca punaḥ sālān saptaikena maheṣuṇā
GE09ram_01_u:108: 1.001.052c giriṃ rasātalaṃ caiva janayan pratyayaṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:109: 1.001.053a tataḥ prītamanās tena viśvastaḥ sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:110: 1.001.053c kiṣkindhāṃ rāmasahito jagāma ca guhāṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:114: 1.001.055c sugrīvam eva tad rājye rāghavaḥ pratyapādayat
GE09ram_01_u:115: 1.001.056a sa ca sarvān samānīya vānarān vānararṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:117: 1.001.057a tato gṛdhrasya vacanāt saṃpāter hanumān balī
GE09ram_01_u:122: 1.001.059c samāśvāsya ca vaidehīṃ mardayām āsa toraṇam
GE09ram_01_u:123: 1.001.060a pañca senāgragān hatvā sapta mantrisutān api
GE09ram_01_u:124: 1.001.060c śūram akṣaṃ ca niṣpiṣya grahaṇaṃ samupāgamat
GE09ram_01_u:126: 1.001.061c marṣayan rākṣasān vīro yantriṇas tān yadṛcchayā
GE09ram_01_u:127: 1.001.062a tato dagdhvā purīṃ laṅkām ṛte sītāṃ ca maithilīm
GE09ram_01_u:128: 1.001.062c rāmāya priyam ākhyātuṃ punar āyān mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:133: 1.001.065a darśayām āsa cātmānaṃ samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:135: 1.001.066a tena gatvā purīṃ laṅkāṃ hatvā rāvaṇam āhave
GE09ram_01_u:140: 1.001.068c kṛtakṛtyas tadā rāmo vijvaraḥ pramumoda ha
GE09ram_01_u:141: 1.001.069a devatābhyo varān prāpya samutthāpya ca vānarān
GE09ram_01_u:142: 1.001.069c puṣpakaṃ tat samāruhya nandigrāmaṃ yayau tadā
GE09ram_01_u:144: 1.001.070c rāmaḥ sītām anuprāpya rājyaṃ punar avāptavān
GE09ram_01_u:147: 1.001.072a na putramaraṇaṃ ke cid drakṣyanti puruṣāḥ kva cit
GE09ram_01_u:149: 1.001.073a na vātajaṃ bhayaṃ kiṃ cin nāpsu majjanti jantavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:150: 1.001.073c na cāgrijaṃ bhayaṃ kiṃ cid yathā kṛtayuge tathā
GE09ram_01_u:154: 1.001.075c cāturvarṇyaṃ ca loke 'smin sve sve dharme niyokṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:157: 1.001.077a idaṃ pavitraṃ pāpaghnaṃ puṇyaṃ vedaiś ca saṃmitam
GE09ram_01_u:159: 1.001.078a etad ākhyānam āyuṣyaṃ paṭhan rāmāyaṇaṃ naraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:165: 1.002.001a nāradasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvā vākyaviśāradaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:167: 1.002.002a yathāvat pūjitas tena devarṣir nāradas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:169: 1.002.003a sa muhūtaṃ gate tasmin devalokaṃ munis tadā
GE09ram_01_u:171: 1.002.004a sa tu tīraṃ samāsādya tamasāyā mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:172: 1.002.004c śiṣyam āha sthitaṃ pārśve dṛṣṭvā tīrtham akardamam
GE09ram_01_u:175: 1.002.006a nyasyatāṃ kalaśas tāta dīyatāṃ valkalaṃ mama
GE09ram_01_u:178: 1.002.007c prāyacchata munes tasya valkalaṃ niyato guroḥ
GE09ram_01_u:180: 1.002.008c vicacāra ha paśyaṃs tat sarvato vipulaṃ vanam
GE09ram_01_u:183: 1.002.010a tasmāt tu mithunād ekaṃ pumāṃsaṃ pāpaniścayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:186: 1.002.011c bhāryā tu nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā rurāva karuṇāṃ giram
GE09ram_01_u:187: 1.002.012a tathā tu taṃ dvijaṃ dṛṣṭvā niṣādena nipātitam
GE09ram_01_u:190: 1.002.013c niśāmya rudatīṃ krauñcīm idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:191: 1.002.014a mā niṣāda pratiṣṭhāṃ tvam agamaḥ śāśvatīṃ samāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:193: 1.002.015a tasyaivaṃ bruvataś cintā babhūva hṛdi vīkṣataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:194: 1.002.015c śokārtenāsya śakuneḥ kim idaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ mayā
GE09ram_01_u:195: 1.002.016a cintayan sa mahāprājñaś cakāra matimān matim
GE09ram_01_u:196: 1.002.016c śiṣyaṃ caivābravīd vākyam idaṃ sa munipuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:198: 1.002.017c śokārtasya pravṛtto me śloko bhavatu nānyathā
GE09ram_01_u:199: 1.002.018a śiṣyas tu tasya bruvato muner vākyam anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:201: 1.002.019a so 'bhiṣekaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā tīrthe tasmin yathāvidhi
GE09ram_01_u:202: 1.002.019c tam eva cintayann artham upāvartata vai muniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:203: 1.002.020a bharadvājas tataḥ śiṣyo vinītaḥ śrutavān guroḥ
GE09ram_01_u:206: 1.002.021c upaviṣṭaḥ kathāś cānyāś cakāra dhyānam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:209: 1.002.023a vālmīkir atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasotthāya vāg yataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:216: 1.002.026c tad gatenaiva manasā vālmīkir dhyānam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:218: 1.002.027c yas tādṛśaṃ cāruravaṃ krauñcaṃ hanyād akāraṇāt
GE09ram_01_u:219: 1.002.028a śocann eva muhuḥ krauñcīm upaślokam imaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:221: 1.002.029a tam uvāca tato brahmā prahasan munipuṃgavam
GE09ram_01_u:222: 1.002.029c śloka eva tvayā baddho nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE09ram_01_u:223: 1.002.030a macchandād eva te brahman pravṛtteyaṃ sarasvatī
GE09ram_01_u:224: 1.002.030c rāmasya caritaṃ kṛtsnaṃ kuru tvam ṛṣisattama
GE09ram_01_u:226: 1.002.031c vṛttaṃ kathaya dhīrasya yathā te nāradāc chrutam
GE09ram_01_u:227: 1.002.032a rahasyaṃ ca prakāśaṃ ca yad vṛttaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:228: 1.002.032c rāmasya saha saumitre rākṣasānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:229: 1.002.033a vaidehyāś caiva yad vṛttaṃ prakāśaṃ yadi vā rahaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:230: 1.002.033c tac cāpy aviditaṃ sarvaṃ viditaṃ te bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:231: 1.002.034a na te vāg anṛtā kāvye kā cid atra bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:232: 1.002.034c kuru rāma kathāṃ puṇyāṃ ślokabaddhāṃ manoramām
GE09ram_01_u:233: 1.002.035a yāvat sthāsyanti girayaḥ saritaś ca mahītale
GE09ram_01_u:235: 1.002.036a yāvad rāmasya ca kathā tvatkṛtā pracariṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:236: 1.002.036c tāvad ūrdhvam adhaś ca tvaṃ mallokeṣu nivatsyasi
GE09ram_01_u:238: 1.002.037c tataḥ saśiṣyo vālmīkir munir vismayam āyayau
GE09ram_01_u:239: 1.002.038a tasya śiṣyās tataḥ sarve jaguḥ ślokam imaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:240: 1.002.038c muhur muhuḥ prīyamāṇāḥ prāhuś ca bhṛśavismitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:241: 1.002.039a samākṣaraiś caturbhir yaḥ pādair gīto maharṣiṇā
GE09ram_01_u:243: 1.002.040a tasya buddhir iyaṃ jātā vālmīker bhāvitātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:244: 1.002.040c kṛtsnaṃ rāmāyaṇaṃ kāvyam īdṛśaiḥ karavāṇy aham
GE09ram_01_u:249: 1.003.001a śrutvā vas tu samagraṃ tad dharmātmā dharmasaṃhitam
GE09ram_01_u:250: 1.003.001c vyaktam anveṣate bhūyo yad vṛttaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:256: 1.003.004c jānakyāś ca vivāhaṃ ca dhanuṣaś ca vibhedanam
GE09ram_01_u:260: 1.003.006c rājñaḥ śokaṃ vilāpaṃ ca paralokasya cāśrayam
GE09ram_01_u:266: 1.003.009c prasādanaṃ ca rāmasya pituś ca salilakriyām
GE09ram_01_u:272: 1.003.012c mārīcasya vadhaṃ caiva vaidehyā haraṇaṃ tathā
GE09ram_01_u:282: 1.003.017c diśaḥ prasthāpanaṃ caiva pṛthivyāś ca nivedanam
GE09ram_01_u:296: 1.003.024c saṃgamaṃ ca samudrasya nalasetoś ca bandhanam
GE09ram_01_u:300: 1.003.026c rāvaṇasya vināśaṃ ca sītāvāptim areḥ pure
GE09ram_01_u:305: 1.003.029a anāgataṃ ca yat kiṃ cid rāmasya vasudhātale
GE09ram_01_u:306: 1.003.029c tac cakārottare kāvye vālmīkir bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:309: 1.004.002a kṛtvā tu tan mahāprājñaḥ sabhaviṣyaṃ sahottaram
GE09ram_01_u:310: 1.004.002c cintayām āsa ko nv etat prayuñjīyād iti prabhuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:315: 1.004.005a sa tu medhāvinau dṛṣṭvā vedeṣu pariniṣṭhitau
GE09ram_01_u:317: 1.004.006a kāvyaṃ rāmāyaṇaṃ kṛtsnaṃ sītāyāś caritaṃ mahat
GE09ram_01_u:318: 1.004.006c paulastya vadham ity eva cakāra caritavrataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:319: 1.004.007a pāṭhye geye ca madhuraṃ pramāṇais tribhir anvitam
GE09ram_01_u:323: 1.004.009a tau tu gāndharvatattvajñau sthāna mūrcchana kovidau
GE09ram_01_u:327: 1.004.011a tau rājaputrau kārtsnyena dharmyam ākhyānam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:328: 1.004.011c vāco vidheyaṃ tat sarvaṃ kṛtvā kāvyam aninditau
GE09ram_01_u:329: 1.004.012a ṛṣīṇāṃ ca dvijātīnāṃ sādhūnāṃ ca samāgame
GE09ram_01_u:332: 1.004.013a tau kadā cit sametānām ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE09ram_01_u:335: 1.004.014c sādhu sādhv ity tāv ūcatuḥ paraṃ vismayam āgatāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:338: 1.004.016a aho gītasya mādhuryaṃ ślokānāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:339: 1.004.016c ciranirvṛttam apy etat pratyakṣam iva darśitam
GE09ram_01_u:340: 1.004.017a praviśya tāv ubhau suṣṭhu tadā bhāvam agāyatām
GE09ram_01_u:344: 1.004.019a prītaḥ kaś cin munis tābhyāṃ saṃsthitaḥ kalaśaṃ dadau
GE09ram_01_u:345: 1.004.019c prasanno valkalaṃ kaś cid dadau tābhyāṃ mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:347: 1.004.020c paraṃ kavīnām ādhāraṃ samāptaṃ ca yathākramam
GE09ram_01_u:348: 1.004.021a praśasyamānau sarvatra kadā cit tatra gāyakau
GE09ram_01_u:352: 1.004.023a āsīnaḥ kāñcane divye sa ca siṃhāsane prabhuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:354: 1.004.024a dṛṣṭvā tu rūpasaṃpannau tāv ubhau vīṇinau tataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:355: 1.004.024c uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmaḥ śatrughnaṃ bharataṃ tathā
GE09ram_01_u:366: 1.005.001a sarvāpūrvam iyaṃ yeṣām āsīt kṛtsnā vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_01_u:368: 1.005.002a yeṣāṃ sa sagaro nāma sāgaro yena khānitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:370: 1.005.003a ikṣvākūṇām idaṃ teṣāṃ rājñāṃ vaṃśe mahātmanām
GE09ram_01_u:371: 1.005.003c mahad utpannam ākhyānaṃ rāmāyaṇam iti śrutam
GE09ram_01_u:372: 1.005.004a tad idaṃ vartayiṣyāmi sarvaṃ nikhilam āditaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:374: 1.005.005a kosalo nāma muditaḥ sphīto janapado mahān
GE09ram_01_u:377: 1.005.006c manunā mānavendreṇa yā purī nirmitā svayam
GE09ram_01_u:378: 1.005.007a āyatā daśa ca dve ca yojanāni mahāpurī
GE09ram_01_u:383: 1.005.009c purīm āvāsayām āsa divi devapatir yathā
GE09ram_01_u:400: 1.005.018a dundubhībhir mṛdaṅgaiś ca vīṇābhiḥ paṇavais tathā
GE09ram_01_u:401: 1.005.018c nāditāṃ bhṛśam atyarthaṃ pṛthivyāṃ tām anuttamām
GE09ram_01_u:404: 1.005.020a ye ca bāṇair na vidhyanti viviktam aparāparam
GE09ram_01_u:407: 1.005.021c hantāro niśitaiḥ śastrair balād bāhubalair api
GE09ram_01_u:409: 1.005.022c purīm āvāsayām āsa rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:421: 1.006.004c tathā daśaratho rājā vasañ jagad apālayat
GE09ram_01_u:424: 1.006.006a tasmin puravare hṛṣṭā dharmātmanā bahu śrutāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:425: 1.006.006c narās tuṣṭādhanaiḥ svaiḥ svair alubdhāḥ satyavādinaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:426: 1.006.007a nālpasaṃnicayaḥ kaś cid āsīt tasmin purottame
GE09ram_01_u:428: 1.006.008a kāmī vā na kadaryo vā nṛśaṃsaḥ puruṣaḥ kva cit
GE09ram_01_u:429: 1.006.008c draṣṭuṃ śakyam ayodhyāyāṃ nāvidvān na ca nāstikaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:430: 1.006.009a sarve narāś ca nāryaś ca dharmaśīlāḥ susaṃyatāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:437: 1.006.012c kaś cid āsīd ayodhyāyāṃ na ca nirvṛttasaṃkaraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:440: 1.006.014a na nāstiko nānṛtako na kaś cid abahuśrutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:441: 1.006.014c nāsūyako na cāśakto nāvidvān vidyate tadā
GE09ram_01_u:442: 1.006.015a na dīnaḥ kṣiptacitto vā vyathito vāpi kaś cana
GE09ram_01_u:443: 1.006.015c kaś cin naro vā nārī vā nāśrīmān nāpy arūpavān
GE09ram_01_u:446: 1.006.016c dīrghāyuṣo narāḥ sarve dharmaṃ satyaṃ ca saṃśritāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:447: 1.006.017a kṣatraṃ brahmamukhaṃ cāsīd vaiśyāḥ kṣatram anuvratāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:457: 1.006.022a añjanād api niṣkrāntair vāmanād api ca dvipaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:458: 1.006.022c bhadramandrair bhadramṛgair mṛgamandraiś ca sā purī
GE09ram_01_u:460: 1.006.023c sā yojane ca dve bhūyaḥ satyanāmā prakāśate
GE09ram_01_u:470: 1.007.003c vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca mantriṇaś ca tathāpare
GE09ram_01_u:474: 1.007.005c krodhāt kāmārthahetor vā na brūyur anṛtaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:475: 1.007.006a teṣām aviditaṃ kiṃ cit sveṣu nāsti pareṣu vā
GE09ram_01_u:478: 1.007.007c prāptakālaṃ yathā daṇḍaṃ dhārayeyuḥ suteṣv api
GE09ram_01_u:480: 1.007.008c ahitaṃ cāpi puruṣaṃ na vihiṃsyur adūṣakam
GE09ram_01_u:481: 1.007.009a vīrāṃś ca niyatotsāhā rāja śāstram anuṣṭhitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:486: 1.007.011c nāsīt pure vā rāṣṭre vā mṛṣāvādī naraḥ kva cit
GE09ram_01_u:487: 1.007.012a kaś cin na duṣṭas tatrāsīt paradāraratir naraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:488: 1.007.012c praśāntaṃ sarvam evāsīd rāṣṭraṃ puravaraṃ ca tat
GE09ram_01_u:489: 1.007.013a suvāsasaḥ suveśāś ca te ca sarve suśīlinaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:491: 1.007.014a gurau guṇagṛhītāś ca prakhyātāś ca parākramaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:493: 1.007.015a īdṛśais tair amātyais tu rājā daśaratho 'naghaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:496: 1.007.016c nādhyagacchad viśiṣṭaṃ vā tulyaṃ vā śatrum ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:501: 1.008.001a tasya tv evaṃ prabhāvasya dharmajñasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:504: 1.008.002c sutārthaṃ vājimedhena kimarthaṃ na yajāmy aham
GE09ram_01_u:505: 1.008.003a sa niścitāṃ matiṃ kṛtvā yaṣṭavyam iti buddhimān
GE09ram_01_u:506: 1.008.003c mantribhiḥ saha dharmātmā sarvair eva kṛtātmabhiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:508: 1.008.004c śīghram ānaya me sarvān gurūṃs tān sapurohitān
GE09ram_01_u:509: 1.008.005a etac chrutvā rahaḥ sūto rājānam idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:512: 1.008.006c ṛṣīṇāṃ saṃnidhau rājaṃs tava putrāgamaṃ prati
GE09ram_01_u:513: 1.008.007a kāśyapasya tu putro 'sti vibhāṇḍaka iti śrutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:514: 1.008.007c ṛṣyaśṛṅga iti khyātas tasya putro bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:515: 1.008.008a sa vane nityasaṃvṛddho munir vanacaraḥ sadā
GE09ram_01_u:518: 1.008.009c lokeṣu prathitaṃ rājan vipraiś ca kathitaṃ sadā
GE09ram_01_u:521: 1.008.011a etasminn eva kāle tu romapādaḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_01_u:532: 1.008.016c prayaccha kanyāṃ śāntāṃ vai vidhinā susamāhitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:533: 1.008.017a teṣāṃ tu vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā cintāṃ prapatsyate
GE09ram_01_u:534: 1.008.017c kenopāyena vai śakyam ihānetuṃ sa vīryavān
GE09ram_01_u:535: 1.008.018a tato rājā viniścitya saha mantribhir ātmavān
GE09ram_01_u:537: 1.008.019a te tu rājño vacaḥ śrutvā vyathitā vanatānanāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:538: 1.008.019c na gacchema ṛṣer bhītā anuneṣyanti taṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_01_u:539: 1.008.020a vakṣyanti cintayitvā te tasyopāyāṃś ca tān kṣamān
GE09ram_01_u:540: 1.008.020c āneṣyāmo vayaṃ vipraṃ na ca doṣo bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:543: 1.008.022a ṛṣyaśṛṅgas tu jāmātā putrāṃs tava vidhāsyati
GE09ram_01_u:547: 1.009.001a sumantraś codito rājñā provācedaṃ vacas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:548: 1.009.001c yatharṣyaśṛṅgas tv ānītaḥ śṛṇu me mantribhiḥ saha
GE09ram_01_u:552: 1.009.003c anabhijñaḥ sa nārīṇāṃ viṣayāṇāṃ sukhasya ca
GE09ram_01_u:557: 1.009.006a śrutvā tatheti rājā ca pratyuvāca purohitam
GE09ram_01_u:558: 1.009.006c purohito mantriṇaś ca tathā cakruś ca te tadā
GE09ram_01_u:559: 1.009.007a vāramukhyās tu tac chrutvā vanaṃ praviviśur mahat
GE09ram_01_u:564: 1.009.009c strī vā pumān vā yac cānyat sattvaṃ nagara rāṣṭrajam
GE09ram_01_u:565: 1.009.010a tataḥ kadā cit taṃ deśam ājagāma yadṛcchayā
GE09ram_01_u:569: 1.009.012a kas tvaṃ kiṃ vartase brahmañ jñātum icchāmahe vayam
GE09ram_01_u:570: 1.009.012c ekas tvaṃ vijane ghore vane carasi śaṃsa naḥ
GE09ram_01_u:571: 1.009.013a adṛṣṭarūpās tās tena kāmyarūpā vane striyaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:572: 1.009.013c hārdāt tasya matir jātā ākhyātuṃ pitaraṃ svakam
GE09ram_01_u:574: 1.009.014c ṛṣyaśṛṅga iti khyātaṃ nāma karma ca me bhuvi
GE09ram_01_u:576: 1.009.015c kariṣye vo 'tra pūjāṃ vai sarveṣāṃ vidhipūrvakam
GE09ram_01_u:577: 1.009.016a ṛṣiputravacaḥ śrutvā sarvāsāṃ matir āsa vai
GE09ram_01_u:578: 1.009.016c tad āśramapadaṃ draṣṭuṃ jagmuḥ sarvāś ca tena ha
GE09ram_01_u:579: 1.009.017a gatānāṃ tu tataḥ pūjām ṛṣiputraś cakāra ha
GE09ram_01_u:580: 1.009.017c idam arghyam idaṃ pādyam idaṃ mūlaṃ phalaṃ ca naḥ
GE09ram_01_u:581: 1.009.018a pratigṛhya tu tāṃ pūjāṃ sarvā eva samutsukāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:582: 1.009.018c ṛṣer bhītāś ca śīghraṃ tu gamanāya matiṃ dadhuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:583: 1.009.019a asmākam api mukhyāni phalānīmāni vai dvija
GE09ram_01_u:584: 1.009.019c gṛhāṇa prati bhadraṃ te bhakṣayasva ca mā ciram
GE09ram_01_u:585: 1.009.020a tatas tās taṃ samāliṅgya sarvā harṣasamanvitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:586: 1.009.020c modakān pradadus tasmai bhakṣyāṃś ca vividhāñ śubhān
GE09ram_01_u:587: 1.009.021a tāni cāsvādya tejasvī phalānīti sma manyate
GE09ram_01_u:589: 1.009.022a āpṛcchya ca tadā vipraṃ vratacaryāṃ nivedya ca
GE09ram_01_u:590: 1.009.022c gacchanti smāpadeśāt tā bhītās tasya pituḥ striyaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:593: 1.009.024a tato 'paredyus taṃ deśam ājagāma sa vīryavān
GE09ram_01_u:594: 1.009.024c manojñā yatra tā dṛṣṭā vāramukhyāḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:595: 1.009.025a dṛṣṭvaiva ca tadā vipram āyāntaṃ hṛṣṭa mānasāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:596: 1.009.025c upasṛtya tataḥ sarvās tās tam ūcur idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:597: 1.009.026a ehy āśramapadaṃ saumya asmākam iti cābruvan
GE09ram_01_u:598: 1.009.026c tatrāpy eṣa vidhiḥ śrīmān viśeṣeṇa bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:599: 1.009.027a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tāsāṃ sarvāsāṃ hṛdayaṃgamam
GE09ram_01_u:600: 1.009.027c gamanāya matiṃ cakre taṃ ca ninyus tadā striyaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:601: 1.009.028a tatra cānīyamāne tu vipre tasmin mahātmani
GE09ram_01_u:602: 1.009.028c vavarṣa sahasā devo jagat prahlādayaṃs tadā
GE09ram_01_u:604: 1.009.029c pratyudgamya muniṃ prahvaḥ śirasā ca mahīṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:605: 1.009.030a arghyaṃ ca pradadau tasmai nyāyataḥ susamāhitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:606: 1.009.030c vavre prasādaṃ viprendrān mā vipraṃ manyur āviśet
GE09ram_01_u:608: 1.009.031c śāntāṃ śāntena manasā rājā harṣam avāpa saḥ
GE09ram_01_u:609: 1.009.032a evaṃ sa nyavasat tatra sarvakāmaiḥ supūjitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:611: 1.010.001a bhūya eva ca rājendra śṛṇu me vacanaṃ hitam
GE09ram_01_u:612: 1.010.001c yathā sa devapravaraḥ kathayām āsa buddhimān
GE09ram_01_u:615: 1.010.003a aṅgarājena sakhyaṃ ca tasya rājño bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:616: 1.010.003c kanyā cāsya mahābhāgā śāntā nāma bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:617: 1.010.004a putras tv aṅgasya rājñas tu romapāda iti śrutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:618: 1.010.004c taṃ sa rājā daśaratho gamiṣyati mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:619: 1.010.005a anapatyo 'smi dharmātmañ śāntā bhāryā mama kratum
GE09ram_01_u:621: 1.010.006a śrutvā rājño 'tha tad vākyaṃ manasā sa vicintya ca
GE09ram_01_u:623: 1.010.007a pratigṛhya ca taṃ vipraṃ sa rājā vigatajvaraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:625: 1.010.008a taṃ ca rājā daśaratho yaṣṭukāmaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_01_u:627: 1.010.009a yajñārthaṃ prasavārthaṃ ca svargārthaṃ ca nareśvaraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:628: 1.010.009c labhate ca sa taṃ kāmaṃ dvija mukhyād viśāṃ patiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:631: 1.010.011a evaṃ sa devapravaraḥ pūrvaṃ kathitavān kathām
GE09ram_01_u:633: 1.010.012a sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla tam ānaya susatkṛtam
GE09ram_01_u:635: 1.010.013a anumānya vasiṣṭhaṃ ca sūtavākyaṃ niśamya ca
GE09ram_01_u:636: 1.010.013c sāntaḥpuraḥ sahāmātyaḥ prayayau yatra sa dvijaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:637: 1.010.014a vanāni saritaś caiva vyatikramya śanaiḥ śanaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:638: 1.010.014c abhicakrāma taṃ deśaṃ yatra vai munipuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:641: 1.010.016a tato rājā yathānyāyaṃ pūjāṃ cakre viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:644: 1.010.017c sakhyaṃ saṃbandhakaṃ caiva tadā taṃ pratyapūjayat
GE09ram_01_u:647: 1.010.019a śāntā tava sutā rājan saha bhartrā viśāmpate
GE09ram_01_u:648: 1.010.019c madīyaṃ nagaraṃ yātu kāryaṃ hi mahad udyatam
GE09ram_01_u:649: 1.010.020a tatheti rājā saṃśrutya gamanaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:650: 1.010.020c uvāca vacanaṃ vipraṃ gaccha tvaṃ saha bhāryayā
GE09ram_01_u:651: 1.010.021a ṛṣiputraḥ pratiśrutya tathety āha nṛpaṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:653: 1.010.022a tāv anyonyāñjaliṃ kṛtvā snehāt saṃśliṣya corasā
GE09ram_01_u:656: 1.010.023c paurebhyaḥ preṣayām āsa dūtān vai śīghragāminaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:657: 1.010.023e kriyatāṃ nagaraṃ sarvaṃ kṣipram eva svalaṃkṛtam
GE09ram_01_u:658: 1.010.024a tataḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ paurās te śrutvā rājānam āgatam
GE09ram_01_u:659: 1.010.024c tathā pracakrus tat sarvaṃ rājñā yat preṣitaṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:660: 1.010.025a tataḥ svalaṃkṛtaṃ rājā nagaraṃ praviveśa ha
GE09ram_01_u:662: 1.010.026a tataḥ pramuditāḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā vai nāgarā dvijam
GE09ram_01_u:664: 1.010.027a antaḥpuraṃ praveśyainaṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tu śāstrataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:668: 1.010.029a pūjyamānā ca tābhiḥ sā rājñā caiva viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:669: 1.010.029c uvāsa tatra sukhitā kaṃ cit kālaṃ saha dvijā
GE09ram_01_u:670: 1.011.001a tataḥ kāle bahutithe kasmiṃś cit sumanohare
GE09ram_01_u:672: 1.011.002a tataḥ prasādya śirasā taṃ vipraṃ devavarṇinam
GE09ram_01_u:673: 1.011.002c yajñāya varayām āsa saṃtānārthaṃ kulasya ca
GE09ram_01_u:674: 1.011.003a tatheti ca sa rājānam uvāca ca susatkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:675: 1.011.003c saṃbhārāḥ saṃbhriyantāṃ te turagaś ca vimucyatām
GE09ram_01_u:679: 1.011.005c samānayat sa tān viprān samastān vedapāragān
GE09ram_01_u:680: 1.011.006a suyajñaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca jābālim atha kāśyapam
GE09ram_01_u:681: 1.011.006c purohitaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ ca ye cānye dvijasattamāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:682: 1.011.007a tān pūjayitvā dharmātmā rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:684: 1.011.008a mama lālapyamānasya putrārthaṃ nāsti vai sukham
GE09ram_01_u:686: 1.011.009a tad ahaṃ yaṣṭum icchāmi śāstradṛṣṭena karmaṇā
GE09ram_01_u:688: 1.011.010a tataḥ sādhv iti tad vākyaṃ brāhmaṇāḥ pratyapūjayan
GE09ram_01_u:691: 1.011.011c saṃbhārāḥ saṃbhriyantāṃ te turagaś ca vimucyatām
GE09ram_01_u:693: 1.011.012c yasya te dhārmikī buddhir iyaṃ putrārtham āgatāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:694: 1.011.013a tataḥ prīto 'bhavad rājā śrutvā tad dvijabhāṣitam
GE09ram_01_u:696: 1.011.014a gurūṇāṃ vacanāc chīghraṃ saṃbhārāḥ saṃbhriyantu me
GE09ram_01_u:700: 1.011.016a śakyaḥ kartum ayaṃ yajñaḥ sarveṇāpi mahīkṣitā
GE09ram_01_u:701: 1.011.016c nāparādho bhavet kaṣṭo yady asmin kratusattame
GE09ram_01_u:704: 1.011.018a tad yathāvidhi pūrvaṃ me kratur eṣa samāpyate
GE09ram_01_u:706: 1.011.019a tatheti ca tataḥ sarve mantriṇaḥ pratyapūjayan
GE09ram_01_u:708: 1.011.020a tato dvijās te dharmajñam astuvan pārthivarṣabham
GE09ram_01_u:709: 1.011.020c anujñātās tataḥ sarve punar jagmur yathāgatam
GE09ram_01_u:710: 1.011.021a gatānāṃ tu dvijātīnāṃ mantriṇas tān narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:711: 1.011.021c visarjayitvā svaṃ veśma praviveśa mahā dyutiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:712: 1.012.001a punaḥ prāpte vasante tu pūrṇaḥ saṃvatsaro 'bhavat
GE09ram_01_u:713: 1.012.001c abhivādya vasiṣṭhaṃ ca nyāyataḥ pratipūjya ca
GE09ram_01_u:715: 1.012.002c yajño me kriyatāṃ vipra yathoktaṃ munipuṃgava
GE09ram_01_u:716: 1.012.003a yathā na vighnaḥ kriyate yajñāṅgeṣu vidhīyatām
GE09ram_01_u:717: 1.012.003c bhavān snigdhaḥ suhṛn mahyaṃ guruś ca paramo bhavān
GE09ram_01_u:718: 1.012.004a voḍhavyo bhavatā caiva bhāro yajñasya codyataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:719: 1.012.004c tatheti ca sa rājānam abravīd dvijasattamaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:720: 1.012.005a kariṣye sarvam evaitad bhavatā yat samarthitam
GE09ram_01_u:734: 1.012.012a dātavyam annaṃ vidhivat satkṛtya na tu līlayā
GE09ram_01_u:738: 1.012.014a teṣām api viśeṣeṇa pūjā kāryā yathākramam
GE09ram_01_u:739: 1.012.014c yathā sarvaṃ suvihitaṃ na kiṃ cit parihīyate
GE09ram_01_u:741: 1.012.015c tataḥ sarve samāgamya vasiṣṭham idam abruvan
GE09ram_01_u:742: 1.012.016a yathoktaṃ tat kariṣyāmo na kiṃ cit parihāsyate
GE09ram_01_u:743: 1.012.016c tataḥ sumantram āhūya vasiṣṭho vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:744: 1.012.017a nimantrayasya nṛpatīn pṛthivyāṃ ye ca dhārmikāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:745: 1.012.017c brāhmaṇān kṣatriyān vaiśyāñ śūdrāṃś caiva sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:749: 1.012.019c tam ānaya mahābhāgaṃ svayam eva susatkṛtam
GE09ram_01_u:750: 1.012.019e pūrvasaṃbandhinaṃ jñātvā tataḥ pūrvaṃ bravīmi te
GE09ram_01_u:758: 1.012.023c dākṣiṇātyān narendrāṃś ca samastān ānayasva ha
GE09ram_01_u:759: 1.012.024a santi snigdhāś ca ye cānye rājānaḥ pṛthivītale
GE09ram_01_u:761: 1.012.025a vasiṣṭhavākyaṃ tac chrutvā sumantras tvaritas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:762: 1.012.025c vyādiśat puruṣāṃs tatra rājñām ānayane śubhān
GE09ram_01_u:763: 1.012.026a svayam eva hi dharmātmā prayayau muniśāsanāt
GE09ram_01_u:765: 1.012.027a te ca karmāntikāḥ sarve vasiṣṭhāya ca dhīmate
GE09ram_01_u:766: 1.012.027c sarvaṃ nivedayanti sma yajñe yad upakalpitam
GE09ram_01_u:767: 1.012.028a tataḥ prīto dvijaśreṣṭhas tān sarvān punar abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:768: 1.012.028c avajñayā na dātavyaṃ kasya cil līlayāpi vā
GE09ram_01_u:769: 1.012.028e avajñayā kṛtaṃ hanyād dātāraṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:770: 1.012.029a tataḥ kaiś cid ahorātrair upayātā mahīkṣitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:771: 1.012.029c bahūni ratnāny ādāya rājño daśarathasya ha
GE09ram_01_u:772: 1.012.030a tato vasiṣṭhaḥ suprīto rājānam idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:775: 1.012.031c yajñiyaṃ ca kṛtaṃ rājan puruṣaiḥ susamāhitaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:776: 1.012.032a niryātu ca bhavān yaṣṭuṃ yajñāyatanam antikāt
GE09ram_01_u:782: 1.013.001a atha saṃvatsare pūrṇe tasmin prāpte turaṅgame
GE09ram_01_u:789: 1.013.004c cakruś ca vidhivat sarvam adhikaṃ karma śāstrataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:790: 1.013.005a abhipūjya tato hṛṣṭāḥ sarve cakrur yathāvidhi
GE09ram_01_u:792: 1.013.006a na cāhutam abhūt tatra skhalitaṃ vāpi kiṃ cana
GE09ram_01_u:793: 1.013.006c dṛśyate brahmavat sarvaṃ kṣemayuktaṃ hi cakrire
GE09ram_01_u:794: 1.013.007a na teṣv ahaḥsu śrānto vā kṣudhito vāpi dṛśyate
GE09ram_01_u:796: 1.013.008a brāhmaṇā bhuñjate nityaṃ nāthavantaś ca bhuñjate
GE09ram_01_u:797: 1.013.008c tāpasā bhujate cāpi śramaṇā bhuñjate tathā
GE09ram_01_u:798: 1.013.009a vṛddhāś ca vyādhitāś caiva striyo bālās tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:800: 1.013.010a dīyatāṃ dīyatām annaṃ vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca
GE09ram_01_u:801: 1.013.010c iti saṃcoditās tatra tathā cakrur anekaśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:803: 1.013.011c divase divase tatra siddhasya vidhivat tadā
GE09ram_01_u:804: 1.013.012a annaṃ hi vidhivat svādu praśaṃsanti dvijarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:805: 1.013.012c aho tṛptāḥ sma bhadraṃ te iti śuśrāva rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:808: 1.013.014a karmāntare tadā viprā hetuvādān bahūn api
GE09ram_01_u:810: 1.013.015a divase divase tatra saṃstare kuśalā dvijāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:813: 1.013.016c sadasyas tasya vai rājño nāvādakuśalo dvijaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:814: 1.013.017a prāpte yūpocchraye tasmin ṣaḍ bailvāḥ khādirās tathā
GE09ram_01_u:820: 1.013.020a vinyastā vidhivat sarve śilpibhiḥ sukṛtā dṛḍhāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:822: 1.013.021a ācchāditās te vāsobhiḥ puṣpair gandhaiś ca bhūṣitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:824: 1.013.022a iṣṭakāś ca yathānyāyaṃ kāritāś ca pramāṇataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:826: 1.013.022e sa cityo rājasiṃhasya saṃcitaḥ kuśalair dvijaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:828: 1.013.023c niyuktās tatra paśavas tat tad uddiśya daivatam
GE09ram_01_u:830: 1.013.024c śāmitre tu hayas tatra tathā jala carāś ca ye
GE09ram_01_u:831: 1.013.025a ṛtvigbhiḥ sarvam evaitan niyuktaṃ śāstratas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:832: 1.013.025c paśūnāṃ triśataṃ tatra yūpeṣu niyataṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:834: 1.013.026a kausalyā taṃ hayaṃ tatra paricarya samantataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:836: 1.013.027a patatriṇā tadā sārdhaṃ susthitena ca cetasā
GE09ram_01_u:841: 1.013.029c ṛtvik parama saṃpannaḥ śrapayām āsa śāstrataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:842: 1.013.030a dhūmagandhaṃ vapāyās tu jighrati sma narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:844: 1.013.031a hayasya yāni cāṅgāni tāni sarvāṇi brāhmaṇāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:854: 1.013.036a prācīṃ hotre dadau rājā diśaṃ svakulavardhanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:855: 1.013.036c adhvaryave pratīcīṃ tu brahmaṇe dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_01_u:858: 1.013.038a kratuṃ samāpya tu tadā nyāyataḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:859: 1.013.038c ṛtvigbhyo hi dadau rājā dharāṃ tāṃ kratuvardhanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:860: 1.013.039a ṛtvijas tv abruvan sarve rājānaṃ gatakalmaṣam
GE09ram_01_u:861: 1.013.039c bhavān eva mahīṃ kṛtsnām eko rakṣitum arhati
GE09ram_01_u:862: 1.013.040a na bhūmyā kāryam asmākaṃ na hi śaktāḥ sma pālane
GE09ram_01_u:863: 1.013.040c ratāḥ svādhyāyakaraṇe vayaṃ nityaṃ hi bhūmipa
GE09ram_01_u:864: 1.013.040e niṣkrayaṃ kiṃ cid eveha prayacchatu bhavān iti
GE09ram_01_u:865: 1.013.041a gavāṃ śatasahasrāṇi daśa tebhyo dadau nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:867: 1.013.042a ṛtvijas tu tataḥ sarve pradaduḥ sahitā vasu
GE09ram_01_u:869: 1.013.043a tatas te nyāyataḥ kṛtvā pravibhāgaṃ dvijottamāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:871: 1.013.044a tataḥ prītamanā rājā prāpya yajñam anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:874: 1.013.045c kulasya vardhanaṃ tat tu kartum arhasi suvrata
GE09ram_01_u:875: 1.013.046a tatheti ca sa rājānam uvāca dvijasattamaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:876: 1.013.046c bhaviṣyanti sutā rājaṃś catvāras te kulodvahāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:877: 1.014.001a medhāvī tu tato dhyātvā sa kiṃ cid idam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:878: 1.014.001c labdhasaṃjñas tatas taṃ tu vedajño nṛpam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:881: 1.014.003a tataḥ prākramad iṣṭiṃ tāṃ putrīyāṃ putra kāraṇāt
GE09ram_01_u:883: 1.014.004a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:885: 1.014.005a tāḥ sametya yathānyāyaṃ tasmin sadasi devatāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:888: 1.014.006c sarvānno bādhate vīryāc chāsituṃ taṃ na śaknumaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:889: 1.014.007a tvayā tasmai varo dattaḥ prītena bhagavan purā
GE09ram_01_u:890: 1.014.007c mānayantaś ca taṃ nityaṃ sarvaṃ tasya kṣamāmahe
GE09ram_01_u:891: 1.014.008a udvejayati lokāṃs trīn ucchritān dveṣṭi durmatiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:893: 1.014.009a ṛṣīn yakṣān sagandharvān asurān brāhmaṇāṃs tathā
GE09ram_01_u:895: 1.014.010a nainaṃ sūryaḥ pratapati pārśve vāti na mārutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:896: 1.014.010c calormimālī taṃ dṛṣṭvā samudro 'pi na kampate
GE09ram_01_u:897: 1.014.011a tan manan no bhayaṃ tasmād rākṣasād ghoradarśanāt
GE09ram_01_u:898: 1.014.011c vadhārthaṃ tasya bhagavann upāyaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:899: 1.014.012a evam uktaḥ suraiḥ sarvaiś cintayitvā tato 'bravīt
GE09ram_01_u:902: 1.014.013c avadhyo 'smīti vāg uktā tathety uktaṃ ca tan mayā
GE09ram_01_u:903: 1.014.014a nākīrtayad avajñānāt tad rakṣo mānuṣāṃs tadā
GE09ram_01_u:904: 1.014.014c tasmāt sa mānuṣād vadhyo mṛtur nānyo 'sya vidyate
GE09ram_01_u:905: 1.014.015a etac chrutvā priyaṃ vākyaṃ brahmaṇā samudāhṛtam
GE09ram_01_u:906: 1.014.015c devā maharṣayaḥ sarve prahṛṣṭās te 'bhavaṃs tadā
GE09ram_01_u:908: 1.014.016c brahmaṇā ca samāgamya tatra tasthau samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:909: 1.014.017a tam abruvan surāḥ sarve samabhiṣṭūya saṃnatāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:915: 1.014.019a tatra tvaṃ mānuṣo bhūtvā pravṛddhaṃ lokakaṇṭakam
GE09ram_01_u:916: 1.014.019c avadhyaṃ daivatair viṣṇo samare jahi rāvaṇam
GE09ram_01_u:917: 1.014.020a sa hi devān sagandharvān siddhāṃś ca ṛṣisattamān
GE09ram_01_u:924: 1.015.001c jānann api surān evaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:925: 1.015.002a upāyaḥ ko vadhe tasya rākṣasādhipateḥ surāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:926: 1.015.002c yam ahaṃ taṃ samāsthāya nihanyām ṛṣikaṇṭakam
GE09ram_01_u:927: 1.015.003a evam uktāḥ surāḥ sarve pratyūcur viṣṇum avyayam
GE09ram_01_u:928: 1.015.003c mānuṣīṃ tanum āsthāya rāvaṇaṃ jahi saṃyuge
GE09ram_01_u:929: 1.015.004a sa hi tepe tapas tīvraṃ dīrghakālam ariṃdama
GE09ram_01_u:931: 1.015.005a saṃtuṣṭaḥ pradadau tasmai rākṣasāya varaṃ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:934: 1.015.006c tasmāt tasya vadho dṛṣṭo mānuṣebhyaḥ paraṃtapa
GE09ram_01_u:935: 1.015.007a ity etad vacanaṃ śrutvā surāṇāṃ viṣṇur ātmavān
GE09ram_01_u:936: 1.015.007c pitaraṃ rocayām āsa tadā daśarathaṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_01_u:937: 1.015.008a sa cāpy aputro nṛpatis tasmin kāle mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:948: 1.015.013c pragṛhya vipulāṃ dorbhyāṃ svayaṃ māyāmayīm iva
GE09ram_01_u:950: 1.015.014c prājāpatyaṃ naraṃ viddhi mām ihābhyāgataṃ nṛpa
GE09ram_01_u:951: 1.015.015a tataḥ paraṃ tadā rājā pratyuvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_01_u:952: 1.015.015c bhagavan svāgataṃ te 'stu kim ahaṃ karavāṇi te
GE09ram_01_u:953: 1.015.016a atho punar idaṃ vākyaṃ prājāpatyo naro 'bravīt
GE09ram_01_u:954: 1.015.016c rājann arcayatā devān adya prāptam idaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_01_u:958: 1.015.018c tāsu tvaṃ lapsyase putrān yadarthaṃ yajase nṛpa
GE09ram_01_u:961: 1.015.020a abhivādya ca tad bhūtam adbhutaṃ priyadarśanam
GE09ram_01_u:970: 1.015.024c pāyasaṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva putrīyaṃ tv idam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:972: 1.015.025c ardhād ardhaṃ dadau cāpi sumitrāyai narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:976: 1.015.027c evaṃ tāsāṃ dadau rājā bhāryāṇāṃ pāyasaṃ pṛthak
GE09ram_01_u:977: 1.015.028a tās tv etat pāyasaṃ prāpya narendrasyottamāḥ striyaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:979: 1.016.001a putratvaṃ tu gate viṣṇau rājñas tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:980: 1.016.001c uvāca devatāḥ sarvāḥ svayambhūr bhagavān idam
GE09ram_01_u:987: 1.016.005a apsaraḥsu ca mukhyāsu gandharvīṇāṃ tanūṣu ca
GE09ram_01_u:989: 1.016.006a kiṃnarīṇāṃ ca gātreṣu vānarīṇāṃ tanūṣu ca
GE09ram_01_u:991: 1.016.007a te tathoktā bhagavatā tat pratiśrutya śāsanam
GE09ram_01_u:992: 1.016.007c janayām āsur evaṃ te putrān vānararūpiṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:994: 1.016.008c cāraṇāś ca sutān vīrān sasṛjur vanacāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:999: 1.016.011a yasya devasya yad rūpaṃ veṣo yaś ca parākramaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1000: 1.016.011c ajāyata samastena tasya tasya sutaḥ pṛthak
GE09ram_01_u:1002: 1.016.012c ṛkṣīṣu ca tathā jātā vānarāḥ kiṃnarīṣu ca
GE09ram_01_u:1006: 1.016.014c kṣobhayeyuś ca vegena samudraṃ saritāṃ patim
GE09ram_01_u:1008: 1.016.015c nabhastalaṃ viśeyuś ca gṛhṇīyur api toyadān
GE09ram_01_u:1009: 1.016.016a gṛhṇīyur api mātaṅgān mattān pravrajato vane
GE09ram_01_u:1015: 1.016.018c anye nānāvidhāñ śailān kānanāni ca bhejire
GE09ram_01_u:1016: 1.016.019a sūryaputraṃ ca sugrīvaṃ śakraputraṃ ca vālinam
GE09ram_01_u:1017: 1.016.019c bhrātarāv upatasthus te sarva eva harīśvarāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1022: 1.017.001a nirvṛtte tu kratau tasmin hayamedhe mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1026: 1.017.003a yathārhaṃ pūjitās tena rājñā vai pṛthivīśvarāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1037: 1.017.008c sākṣād viṣṇoś caturbhāgaḥ sarvaiḥ samudito guṇaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1040: 1.017.010a rājñaḥ putrā mahātmānaś catvāro jajñire pṛthak
GE09ram_01_u:1044: 1.017.012a saumitriṃ lakṣmaṇam iti śatrughnam aparaṃ tathā
GE09ram_01_u:1047: 1.017.013a teṣāṃ ketur iva jyeṣṭho rāmo ratikaraḥ pituḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1048: 1.017.013c babhūva bhūyo bhūtānāṃ svayambhūr iva saṃmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1049: 1.017.014a sarve vedavidaḥ śūrāḥ sarve lokahite ratāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1056: 1.017.017c na ca tena vinā nidrāṃ labhate puruṣottamaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1057: 1.017.017e mṛṣṭam annam upānītam aśnāti na hi taṃ vinā
GE09ram_01_u:1058: 1.017.018a yadā hi hayam ārūḍho mṛgayāṃ yāti rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1061: 1.017.019c prāṇaiḥ priyataro nityaṃ tasya cāsīt tathā priyaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1062: 1.017.020a sa caturbhir mahābhāgaiḥ putrair daśarathaḥ priyaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1064: 1.017.021a te yadā jñānasaṃpannāḥ sarve samuditā guṇaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1066: 1.017.022a atha rājā daśarathas teṣāṃ dārakriyāṃ prati
GE09ram_01_u:1070: 1.017.024a sa rājño darśanākāṅkṣī dvārādhyakṣān uvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:1071: 1.017.024c śīghram ākhyāta māṃ prāptaṃ kauśikaṃ gādhinaḥ sutam
GE09ram_01_u:1072: 1.017.025a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya rājaveśma pradudruvuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1074: 1.017.026a te gatvā rājabhavanaṃ viśvāmitram ṛṣiṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1076: 1.017.027a teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā sapurodhāḥ samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1078: 1.017.028a sa dṛṣṭvā jvalitaṃ dīptyā tāpasaṃ saṃśitavratam
GE09ram_01_u:1083: 1.017.030c ṛṣīṃś ca tān yathā nyāyaṃ mahābhāgān uvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:1084: 1.017.031a te sarve hṛṣṭamanasas tasya rājño niveśanam
GE09ram_01_u:1085: 1.017.031c viviśuḥ pūjitās tatra niṣeduś ca yathārthataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1090: 1.017.033e pranaṣṭasya yathā lābho yathā harṣo mahodaye
GE09ram_01_u:1092: 1.017.034a kaṃ ca te paramaṃ kāmaṃ karomi kim u harṣitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1093: 1.017.034c pātrabhūto 'si me vipra diṣṭyā prāpto 'si dhārmika
GE09ram_01_u:1094: 1.017.034e adya me saphalaṃ janma jīvitaṃ ca sujīvitam
GE09ram_01_u:1097: 1.017.036a tad adbhutam idaṃ vipra pavitraṃ paramaṃ mama
GE09ram_01_u:1099: 1.017.037a brūhi yat prārthitaṃ tubhyaṃ kāryam āgamanaṃ prati
GE09ram_01_u:1101: 1.017.038a kāryasya na vimarśaṃ ca gantum arhasi kauśika
GE09ram_01_u:1102: 1.017.038c kartā cāham aśeṣeṇa daivataṃ hi bhavān mama
GE09ram_01_u:1111: 1.018.003a yat tu me hṛdgataṃ vākyaṃ tasya kāryasya niścayam
GE09ram_01_u:1114: 1.018.004c tasya vighnakarau dvau tu rākṣasau kāmarūpiṇau
GE09ram_01_u:1115: 1.018.005a vrate me bahuśaś cīrṇe samāptyāṃ rākṣasāv imau
GE09ram_01_u:1116: 1.018.005c mārīcaś ca subāhuś ca vīryavantau suśikṣitau
GE09ram_01_u:1120: 1.018.007a na ca me krodham utsraṣṭuṃ buddhir bhavati pārthiva
GE09ram_01_u:1121: 1.018.007c tathābhūtā hi sā caryā na śāpas tatra mucyate
GE09ram_01_u:1123: 1.018.008c kākapakṣadharaṃ śūraṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ me dātum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:1124: 1.018.009a śakto hy eṣa mayā gupto divyena svena tejasā
GE09ram_01_u:1125: 1.018.009c rākṣasā ye vikartāras teṣām api vināśane
GE09ram_01_u:1126: 1.018.010a śreyaś cāsmai pradāsyāmi bahurūpaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1127: 1.018.010c trayāṇām api lokānāṃ yena khyātiṃ gamiṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:1128: 1.018.011a na ca tau rāmam āsādya śaktau sthātuṃ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_01_u:1129: 1.018.011c na ca tau rāghavād anyo hantum utsahate pumān
GE09ram_01_u:1130: 1.018.012a vīryotsiktau hi tau pāpau kālapāśavaśaṃ gatau
GE09ram_01_u:1132: 1.018.013a na ca putrakṛtaṃ snehaṃ kartum arhasi pārthiva
GE09ram_01_u:1133: 1.018.013c ahaṃ te pratijānāmi hatau tau viddhi rākṣasau
GE09ram_01_u:1135: 1.018.014c vasiṣṭho 'pi mahātejā ye ceme tapasi sthitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1136: 1.018.015a yadi te dharmalābhaṃ ca yaśaś ca paramaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_01_u:1137: 1.018.015c sthiram icchasi rājendra rāmaṃ me dātum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:1138: 1.018.016a yady abhyanujñāṃ kākutstha dadate tava mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1139: 1.018.016c vasiṣṭha pramukhāḥ sarve tato rāmaṃ visarjaya
GE09ram_01_u:1142: 1.018.018a nātyeti kālo yajñasya yathāyaṃ mama rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:1143: 1.018.018c tathā kuruṣva bhadraṃ te mā ca śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1144: 1.018.019a ity evam uktvā dharmātmā dharmārthasahitaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1151: 1.019.001c muhūrtam iva niḥsaṃjñaḥ saṃjñāvān idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1153: 1.019.002c na yuddhayogyatām asya paśyāmi saha rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1154: 1.019.003a iyam akṣauhiṇī pūrṇā yasyāhaṃ patir īśvaraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1155: 1.019.003c anayā saṃvṛto gatvā yodhāhaṃ tair niśācaraiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1156: 1.019.004a ime śūrāś ca vikrāntā bhṛtyā me 'straviśāradāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1157: 1.019.004c yogyā rakṣogaṇair yoddhuṃ na rāmaṃ netum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:1159: 1.019.005c yāvat prāṇān dhariṣyāmi tāvad yotsye niśācaraiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1161: 1.019.006c ahaṃ tatra gamiṣyāmil na rāma netum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:1162: 1.019.007a bālo hy akṛtavidyaś ca na ca vetti balābalam
GE09ram_01_u:1164: 1.019.007e na cāsau rakṣasāṃ yogyaḥ kūṭayuddhā hi te dhruvam
GE09ram_01_u:1165: 1.019.008a viprayukto hi rāmeṇa muhūrtam api notsahe
GE09ram_01_u:1166: 1.019.008c jīvituṃ muniśārdūla na rāmaṃ netum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:1167: 1.019.009a yadi vā rāghavaṃ brahman netum icchasi suvrata
GE09ram_01_u:1168: 1.019.009c caturaṅgasamāyuktaṃ mayā saha ca taṃ naya
GE09ram_01_u:1170: 1.019.010c duḥkhenotpāditaś cāyaṃ na rāmaṃ netum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:1171: 1.019.011a caturṇām ātmajānāṃ hi prītiḥ paramikā mama
GE09ram_01_u:1172: 1.019.011c jyeṣṭhaṃ dharmapradhānaṃ ca na rāmaṃ netum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:1173: 1.019.012a kiṃ vīryā rākṣasās te ca kasya putrāś ca ke ca te
GE09ram_01_u:1174: 1.019.012c kathaṃ pramāṇāḥ ke caitān rakṣanti munipuṃgava
GE09ram_01_u:1175: 1.019.013a kathaṃ ca pratikartavyaṃ teṣāṃ rāmeṇa rakṣasām
GE09ram_01_u:1176: 1.019.013c māmakair vā balair brahman mayā vā kūṭayodhinām
GE09ram_01_u:1177: 1.019.014a sarvaṃ me śaṃsa bhagavan kathaṃ teṣāṃ mayā raṇe
GE09ram_01_u:1181: 1.019.016a sa brahmaṇā dattavaras trailokyaṃ bādhate bhṛśam
GE09ram_01_u:1185: 1.019.018a yadā svayaṃ na yajñasya vighnakartā mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1186: 1.019.018c tena saṃcoditau tau tu rākṣasau sumahā balau
GE09ram_01_u:1187: 1.019.018e mārīcaś ca subāhuś ca yajñavighnaṃ kariṣyataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1188: 1.019.019a ity ukto muninā tena rājovāca muniṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1189: 1.019.019c na hi śakto 'smi saṃgrāme sthātuṃ tasya durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1190: 1.019.020a sa tvaṃ prasādaṃ dharmajña kuruṣva mama putrake
GE09ram_01_u:1192: 1.019.021a na śaktā rāvaṇaṃ soḍhuṃ kiṃ punar mānavā yudhi
GE09ram_01_u:1193: 1.019.021c sa hi vīryavatāṃ vīryam ādatte yudhi rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1194: 1.019.022a tena cāhaṃ na śakto 'smi saṃyoddhuṃ tasya vā balaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1195: 1.019.022c sabalo vā muniśreṣṭha sahito vā mamātmajaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1197: 1.019.023c bālaṃ me tanayaṃ brahman naiva dāsyāmi putrakam
GE09ram_01_u:1199: 1.019.024c yajñavighnakarau tau te naiva dāsyāmi putrakam
GE09ram_01_u:1200: 1.019.025a mārīcaś ca subāhuś ca vīryavantau suśikṣitau
GE09ram_01_u:1204: 1.020.002a pūrvam arthaṃ pratiśrutya pratijñāṃ hātum icchasi
GE09ram_01_u:1206: 1.020.003a yad idaṃ te kṣamaṃ rājan gamiṣyāmi yathāgatam
GE09ram_01_u:1209: 1.020.004c cacāla vasudhā kṛtsnā viveśa ca bhayaṃ surān
GE09ram_01_u:1210: 1.020.005a trastarūpaṃ tu vijñāya jagat sarvaṃ mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1211: 1.020.005c nṛpatiṃ suvrato dhīro vasiṣṭho vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1212: 1.020.006a ikṣvākūṇāṃ kule jātaḥ sākṣād dharma ivāparaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1213: 1.020.006c dhṛtimānsuvrataḥ śrīmān na dharmaṃ hātum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:1214: 1.020.007a triṣu lokeṣu vikhyāto dharmātmā iti rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1218: 1.020.009a kṛtāstram akṛtāstraṃ vā nainaṃ śakṣyanti rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1220: 1.020.010a eṣa vigrahavān dharma eṣa vīryavatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1221: 1.020.010c eṣa buddhyādhiko loke tapasaś ca parāyaṇam
GE09ram_01_u:1223: 1.020.011c nainam anyaḥ pumān vetti na ca vetsyanti ke cana
GE09ram_01_u:1224: 1.020.012a na devā narṣayaḥ ke cin nāsurā na ca rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1227: 1.020.013c kauśikāya purā dattā yadā rājyaṃ praśāsati
GE09ram_01_u:1230: 1.020.015a jayā ca suprabhā caiva dakṣakanye sumadhyame
GE09ram_01_u:1232: 1.020.016a pañcāśataṃ sutāṃl lebhe jayā nāma varān purā
GE09ram_01_u:1236: 1.020.018a tāni cāstrāṇi vetty eṣa yathāvat kuśikātmajaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1237: 1.020.018c apūrvāṇāṃ ca janane śakto bhūyaś ca dharmavit
GE09ram_01_u:1239: 1.020.019c na rāmagamane rājan saṃśayaṃ gantum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:1240: 1.021.001a tathā vasiṣṭhe bruvati rājā daśarathaḥ sutam
GE09ram_01_u:1244: 1.021.003a sa putraṃ mūrdhny upāghrāya rājā daśarathaḥ priyam
GE09ram_01_u:1246: 1.021.004a tato vāyuḥ sukhasparśo virajasko vavau tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1250: 1.021.006a viśvāmitro yayāv agre tato rāmo mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1251: 1.021.006c kākapakṣadharo dhanvī taṃ ca saumitrir anvagāt
GE09ram_01_u:1256: 1.021.008c sthāṇuṃ devam ivācintyaṃ kumārāv iva pāvakī
GE09ram_01_u:1259: 1.021.010a gṛhāṇa vatsa salilaṃ mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1260: 1.021.010c mantragrāmaṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ balām atibalāṃ tathā
GE09ram_01_u:1261: 1.021.011a na śramo na jvaro vā te na rūpasya viparyayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1262: 1.021.011c na ca suptaṃ pramattaṃ vā dharṣayiṣyanti nairṛtāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1263: 1.021.012a na bāhvoḥ sadṛśo vīrye pṛthivyām asti kaś cana
GE09ram_01_u:1264: 1.021.012c triṣu lokeṣu vā rāma na bhavet sadṛśas tava
GE09ram_01_u:1265: 1.021.013a na saubhāgye na dākṣiṇye na jñāne buddhiniścaye
GE09ram_01_u:1267: 1.021.014a etadvidyādvaye labdhe bhavitā nāsti te samaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1269: 1.021.015a kṣutpipāse na te rāma bhaviṣyete narottama
GE09ram_01_u:1270: 1.021.015c balām atibalāṃ caiva paṭhataḥ pathi rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:1271: 1.021.015e vidyādvayam adhīyāne yaśaś cāpy atulaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_01_u:1273: 1.021.016c pradātuṃ tava kākutstha sadṛśas tvaṃ hi dhārmika
GE09ram_01_u:1274: 1.021.017a kāmaṃ bahuguṇāḥ sarve tvayy ete nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1276: 1.021.018a tato rāmo jalaṃ spṛṣṭvā prahṛṣṭavadanaḥ śuciḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1280: 1.021.019c ūṣus tāṃ rajanīṃ tatra sarayvāṃ susukhaṃ trayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1283: 1.022.002a kausalyā suprajā rāma pūrvā saṃdhyā pravartate
GE09ram_01_u:1286: 1.022.003c snātvā kṛtodakau vīrau jepatuḥ paramaṃ japam
GE09ram_01_u:1289: 1.022.005a tau prayāte mahāvīryau divyaṃ tripathagāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_01_u:1290: 1.022.005c dadṛśāte tatas tatra sarayvāḥ saṃgame śubhe
GE09ram_01_u:1293: 1.022.007a taṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaprītau rāghavau puṇyam āśramam
GE09ram_01_u:1294: 1.022.007c ūcatus taṃ mahātmānaṃ viśvāmitram idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1295: 1.022.008a kasyāyam āśramaḥ puṇyaḥ ko nv asmin vasate pumān
GE09ram_01_u:1296: 1.022.008c bhagavañ śrotum icchāvaḥ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi nau
GE09ram_01_u:1297: 1.022.009a tayos tad vacanaṃ śrutvā prahasya munipuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1298: 1.022.009c abravīc chrūyatāṃ rāma yasyāyaṃ pūrva āśramaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1299: 1.022.010a kandarpo mūrtimān āsīt kāma ity ucyate budhaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1302: 1.022.011e dharṣayām āsa durmedhā huṃkṛtaś ca mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:1305: 1.022.013a tasya gātraṃ hataṃ tatra nirdagdhasya mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:1306: 1.022.013c aśarīraḥ kṛtaḥ kāmaḥ krodhād deveśvareṇa ha
GE09ram_01_u:1307: 1.022.014a anaṅga iti vikhyātas tadā prabhṛti rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:1308: 1.022.014c sa cāṅgaviṣayaḥ śrīmān yatrāṅgaṃ sa mumoca ha
GE09ram_01_u:1309: 1.022.015a tasyāyam āśramaḥ puṇyas tasyeme munayaḥ purā
GE09ram_01_u:1310: 1.022.015c śiṣyā dharmaparā vīra teṣāṃ pāpaṃ na vidyate
GE09ram_01_u:1312: 1.022.016c puṇyayoḥ saritor madhye śvas tariṣyāmahe vayam
GE09ram_01_u:1313: 1.022.017a teṣāṃ saṃvadatāṃ tatra tapo dīrgheṇa cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_01_u:1321: 1.023.002a te ca sarve mahātmāno munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1324: 1.023.003c ariṣṭaṃ gaccha panthānaṃ mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1325: 1.023.004a viśvāmitras tathety uktvā tān ṛṣīn abhipūjya ca
GE09ram_01_u:1326: 1.023.004c tatāra sahitas tābhyāṃ saritaṃ sāgaraṃ gamām
GE09ram_01_u:1328: 1.023.005c vāriṇo bhidyamānasya kim ayaṃ tumulo dhvaniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1330: 1.023.006c kathayām āsa dharmātmā tasya śabdasya niścayam
GE09ram_01_u:1337: 1.023.010a tābhyāṃ tu tāv ubhau kṛtvā praṇāmam atidhārmikau
GE09ram_01_u:1346: 1.023.014c saṃkīrṇaṃ badarībhiś ca kiṃ nv idaṃ dāruṇaṃ vanam
GE09ram_01_u:1348: 1.023.015c śrūyatāṃ vatsa kākutstha yasyaitad dāruṇaṃ vanam
GE09ram_01_u:1349: 1.023.016a etau janapadau sphītau pūrvam āstāṃ narottama
GE09ram_01_u:1350: 1.023.016c maladāś ca karūṣāś ca devanirmāṇa nirmitau
GE09ram_01_u:1353: 1.023.018a tam indraṃ snāpayan devā ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1354: 1.023.018c kalaśaiḥ snāpayām āsur malaṃ cāsya pramocayan
GE09ram_01_u:1355: 1.023.019a iha bhūmyāṃ malaṃ dattvā dattvā kāruṣam eva ca
GE09ram_01_u:1357: 1.023.020a nirmalo niṣkarūṣaś ca śucir indro yadābhavat
GE09ram_01_u:1358: 1.023.020c dadau deśasya suprīto varaṃ prabhur anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:1359: 1.023.021a imau janapadau sthītau khyātiṃ loke gamiṣyataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1361: 1.023.022a sādhu sādhv iti taṃ devāḥ pākaśāsanam abruvan
GE09ram_01_u:1362: 1.023.022c deśasya pūjāṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtāṃ śakreṇa dhīmatā
GE09ram_01_u:1364: 1.023.023c maladāś ca karūṣāś ca muditau dhanadhānyataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1365: 1.023.024a kasya cit tv atha kālasya yakṣī vai kāmarūpiṇī
GE09ram_01_u:1366: 1.023.024c balaṃ nāgasahasrasya dhārayantī tadā hy abhūt
GE09ram_01_u:1367: 1.023.025a tāṭakā nāma bhadraṃ te bhāryā sundasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1370: 1.023.026c maladāṃś ca karūṣāṃś ca tāṭakā duṣṭacāriṇī
GE09ram_01_u:1372: 1.023.027c ata eva ca gantavyaṃ tāṭakāyā vanaṃ yataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1374: 1.023.028c manniyogād imaṃ deśaṃ kuru niṣkaṇṭakaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1375: 1.023.029a na hi kaś cid imaṃ deśaṃ śakroty āgantum īdṛśam
GE09ram_01_u:1377: 1.023.030a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yathaitad daruṇaṃ vanam
GE09ram_01_u:1378: 1.023.030c yakṣyā cotsāditaṃ sarvam adyāpi na nivartate
GE09ram_01_u:1385: 1.024.004a pūrvam āsīn mahāyakṣaḥ suketur nāma vīryavān
GE09ram_01_u:1386: 1.024.004c anapatyaḥ śubhācāraḥ sa ca tepe mahat tapaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1387: 1.024.005a pitāmahas tu suprītas tasya yakṣapates tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1388: 1.024.005c kanyāratnaṃ dadau rāma tāṭakāṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1390: 1.024.006c na tv eva putraṃ yakṣāya dadau brahmā mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1393: 1.024.008a kasya cit tv atha kālalsya yakṣī putraṃ vyajāyata
GE09ram_01_u:1394: 1.024.008c mārīcaṃ nāma durdharṣaṃ yaḥ śāpād rākṣaso 'bhavat
GE09ram_01_u:1395: 1.024.009a sunde tu nihate rāma agastyam ṛṣisattamam
GE09ram_01_u:1400: 1.024.011c idaṃ rūpam apahāya dāruṇaṃ rūpam astu te
GE09ram_01_u:1405: 1.024.014a na hy enāṃ śāpasaṃsṛṣṭāṃ kaś cid utsahate pumān
GE09ram_01_u:1406: 1.024.014c nihantuṃ triṣu lokeṣu tvām ṛte raghunandana
GE09ram_01_u:1407: 1.024.015a na hi te strīvadhakṛte ghṛṇā kāryā narottama
GE09ram_01_u:1410: 1.024.016c adharmyāṃ jahi kākutsha dharmo hy asyā na vidyate
GE09ram_01_u:1411: 1.024.017a śrūyate hi purā śakro virocanasutāṃ nṛpa
GE09ram_01_u:1413: 1.024.018a viṣṇunā ca purā rāma bhṛgupatnī dṛḍhavratā
GE09ram_01_u:1422: 1.025.003c pitrā daśarathenāhaṃ nāvajñeyaṃ ca tad vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1423: 1.025.004a so 'haṃ pitur vacaḥ śrutvā śāsanād brahma vādinaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1427: 1.025.006a evam uktvā dhanurmadhye baddhvā muṣṭim ariṃdamaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1428: 1.025.006c jyāśabdam akarot tīvraṃ diśaḥ śabdena pūrayan
GE09ram_01_u:1430: 1.025.007c tāṭakā ca susaṃkruddhā tena śabdena mohitā
GE09ram_01_u:1432: 1.025.008c śrutvā cābhyadravad vegād yataḥ śabdo viniḥsṛtaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1433: 1.025.009a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ kruddhāṃ vikṛtāṃ vikṛtānanām
GE09ram_01_u:1435: 1.025.010a paśya lakṣmaṇa yakṣiṇyā bhairavaṃ dāruṇaṃ vapuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1436: 1.025.010c bhidyeran darśanād asyā bhīrūṇāṃ hṛdayāni ca
GE09ram_01_u:1439: 1.025.012a na hy enām utsahe hantuṃ strīsvabhāvena rakṣitām
GE09ram_01_u:1440: 1.025.012c vīryaṃ cāsyā gatiṃ cāpi haniṣyāmīti me matiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1441: 1.025.013a evaṃ bruvāṇe rāme tu tāṭakā krodhamūrchitā
GE09ram_01_u:1443: 1.025.014a tām āpatantīṃ vegena vikrāntām aśanīm iva
GE09ram_01_u:1444: 1.025.014c śareṇorasi vivyādha sā papāta mamāra ca
GE09ram_01_u:1445: 1.025.015a tāṃ hatāṃ bhīmasaṃkāśāṃ dṛṣṭvā surapatis tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1446: 1.025.015c sādhu sādhv iti kākutsthaṃ surāś ca samapūjayan
GE09ram_01_u:1448: 1.025.016c surāś ca sarve saṃhṛṣṭā viśvāmitram athābruvan
GE09ram_01_u:1449: 1.025.017a mune kauśike bhadraṃ te sendrāḥ sarve marudgaṇāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1453: 1.025.019a pātrabhūtaś ca te brahmaṃs tavānugamane dhṛtaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1454: 1.025.019c kartavyaṃ ca mahat karma surāṇāṃ rājasūnunā
GE09ram_01_u:1455: 1.025.020a evam uktvā surāḥ sarve hṛṣṭā jagmur yathāgatam
GE09ram_01_u:1458: 1.025.021c mūrdhni rāmam upāghrāya idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1460: 1.025.022c śvaḥ prabhāte gamiṣyāmas tad āśramapadaṃ mama
GE09ram_01_u:1461: 1.026.001a atha tāṃ rajanīm uṣya viśvāmiro mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1464: 1.026.002c prītyā paramayā yukto dadāmy astrāṇi sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1467: 1.026.004a tāni divyāni bhadraṃ te dadāmy astrāṇi sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1468: 1.026.004c daṇḍacakraṃ mahad divyaṃ tava dāsyāmi rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:1469: 1.026.005a dharmacakraṃ tato vīra kālacakraṃ tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:1470: 1.026.005c viṣṇucakraṃ tathātyugram aindraṃ cakraṃ tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:1471: 1.026.006a vajram astraṃ naraśreṣṭha śaivaṃ śūlavaraṃ tathā
GE09ram_01_u:1472: 1.026.006c astraṃ brahmaśiraś caiva aiṣīkam api rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:1473: 1.026.007a dadāmi te mahābāho brāhmam astram anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:1474: 1.026.007c gade dve caiva kākutstha modakī śikharī ubhe
GE09ram_01_u:1476: 1.026.008c dharmapāśam ahaṃ rāma kālapāśaṃ tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:1477: 1.026.009a vāruṇaṃ pāśam astraṃ ca dadāny aham anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:1479: 1.026.010a dadāmi cāstraṃ painākam astraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ tathā
GE09ram_01_u:1480: 1.026.010c āgneyam astra dayitaṃ śikharaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1481: 1.026.011a vāyavyaṃ prathamaṃ nāma dadāmi tava rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:1482: 1.026.011c astraṃ hayaśiro nāma krauñcam astraṃ tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:1483: 1.026.012a śakti dvayaṃ ca kākutstha dadāmi tava cānagha
GE09ram_01_u:1484: 1.026.012c kaṅkālaṃ musalaṃ ghoraṃ kāpālam atha kaṅkaṇam
GE09ram_01_u:1485: 1.026.013a dhārayanty asurā yāni dadāmy etāni sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1486: 1.026.013c vaidyādharaṃ mahāstraṃ ca nandanaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1488: 1.026.014c gāndharvam astraṃ dayitaṃ mānavaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1492: 1.026.016c paiśācam astraṃ dayitaṃ mohanaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1495: 1.026.017c saṃvartaṃ caiva durdharṣaṃ mausalaṃ ca nṛpātmaja
GE09ram_01_u:1496: 1.026.018a satyam astraṃ mahābāho tathā māyādharaṃ param
GE09ram_01_u:1498: 1.026.019a somāstraṃ śiśiraṃ nāma tvāṣṭram astraṃ sudāmanam
GE09ram_01_u:1499: 1.026.019c dāruṇaṃ ca bhagasyāpi śīteṣum atha mānavam
GE09ram_01_u:1502: 1.026.021a sthitas tu prāṅmukho bhūtvā śucir nivaratas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1504: 1.026.022a japatas tu munes tasya viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1506: 1.026.023a ūcuś ca muditā rāmaṃ sarve prāñjalayas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1507: 1.026.023c ime sma paramodāra kiṃkarās tava rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:1508: 1.026.024a pratigṛhya ca kākutsthaḥ samālabhya ca pāṇinā
GE09ram_01_u:1509: 1.026.024c manasā me bhaviṣyadhvam iti tāny abhyacodayat
GE09ram_01_u:1513: 1.027.001c gacchann eva ca kākutstho viśvāmitram athābravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1515: 1.027.002c astrāṇāṃ tv aham icchāmi saṃhāraṃ munipuṃgava
GE09ram_01_u:1518: 1.027.004a satyavantaṃ satyakīrtiṃ dhṛṣṭaṃ rabhasam eva ca
GE09ram_01_u:1523: 1.027.006c jyotiṣaṃ kṛśanaṃ caiva nairāśya vimalāv ubhau
GE09ram_01_u:1530: 1.027.010a pratīccha mama bhadraṃ te pātrabhūto 'si rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:1533: 1.027.011c ime sma naraśārdūla śādhi kiṃ karavāma te
GE09ram_01_u:1534: 1.027.012a gamyatām iti tān āha yatheṣṭaṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1536: 1.027.013a atha te rāmam āmantrya kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_01_u:1537: 1.027.013c evam astv iti kākutstham uktvā jagmur yathāgatam

GE09ram_01_u:1539: 1.027.014c gacchann evātha madhuraṃ ślakṣṇaṃ vacanam abravīt

GE09ram_01_u:1546: 1.027.018a sarvaṃ me śaṃsa bhagavan kasyāśramapadaṃ tv idam

GE09ram_01_u:1551: 1.028.002c siddhāśrama iti khyātaḥ siddho hy atra mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1552: 1.028.003a etasminn eva kāle tu rājā vairocanir baliḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1554: 1.028.003e kārayām āsa tad rājyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1556: 1.028.004c samāgamya svayaṃ caiva viṣṇum ūcur ihāśrame
GE09ram_01_u:1557: 1.028.005a balir vairocanir viṣṇo yajate yajñam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:1559: 1.028.006a ye cainam abhivartante yācitāra itas tataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1560: 1.028.006c yac ca yatra yathāvac ca sarvaṃ tebhyaḥ prayacchati
GE09ram_01_u:1562: 1.028.007c vāmanatvaṃ gato viṣṇo kuru kalyāṇam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:1563: 1.028.008a ayaṃ siddhāśramo nāma prasādāt te bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:1564: 1.028.008c siddhe karmaṇi deveśa uttiṣṭha bhagavann itaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1567: 1.028.010a trīn kramān atha bhikṣitvā pratigṛhya ca mānataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1569: 1.028.011a mahendrāya punaḥ prādān niyamya balim ojasā
GE09ram_01_u:1570: 1.028.011c trailokyaṃ sa mahātejāś cakre śakravaśaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1576: 1.028.014c tad āśramapadaṃ tāta tavāpy etad yathā mama
GE09ram_01_u:1583: 1.028.018a adyaiva dīkṣāṃ praviśa bhadraṃ te munipuṃgava

GE09ram_01_u:1587: 1.028.020a kumārāv api tāṃ rātrim uṣitvā susamāhitau
GE09ram_01_u:1590: 1.029.001c deśe kāle ca vākyajñāv abrūtāṃ kauśikaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1591: 1.029.002a bhagavañ śrotum icchāvo yasmin kāle niśācarau
GE09ram_01_u:1594: 1.029.003c sarve te munayaḥ prītāḥ praśaśaṃsur nṛpātmajau
GE09ram_01_u:1595: 1.029.004a adya prabhṛti ṣaḍrātraṃ rakṣataṃ rāghavau yuvām
GE09ram_01_u:1596: 1.029.004c dīkṣāṃ gato hy eṣa munir maunitvaṃ ca gamiṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:1597: 1.029.005a tau tu tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rājaputrau yaśasvinau
GE09ram_01_u:1601: 1.029.007a atha kāle gate tasmin ṣaṣṭhe 'hani samāgate
GE09ram_01_u:1602: 1.029.007c saumitram abravīd rāmo yatto bhava samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1606: 1.029.009c ākāśe ca mahāñ śabdaḥ prādur āsīd bhayānakaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1607: 1.029.010a āvārya gaganaṃ megho yathā prāvṛṣi nirgataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1609: 1.029.011a mārīcaś ca subāhuś ca tayor anucarās tathā
GE09ram_01_u:1612: 1.029.012c lakṣmaṇaṃ tv abhisaṃprekṣya rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1620: 1.029.016c nirastaṃ dṛśya mārīcaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1622: 1.029.017c mohayitvā nayaty enaṃ na ca prāṇair viyujyate
GE09ram_01_u:1626: 1.029.019c subāhur asi cikṣepa sa viddhaḥ prāpatad bhuvi
GE09ram_01_u:1629: 1.029.021a sa hatvā rākṣasān sarvān yajñaghnān raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1630: 1.029.021c ṛṣibhiḥ pūjitas tatra yathendro vijaye purā
GE09ram_01_u:1631: 1.029.022a atha yajñe samāpte tu viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1632: 1.029.022c nirītikā diśo dṛṣṭvā kākutstham idam abravīt

GE09ram_01_u:1635: 1.030.001a atha tāṃ rajanīṃ tatra kṛtārthau rāmalakṣaṇau
GE09ram_01_u:1642: 1.030.004c ājñāpaya yatheṣṭaṃ vai śāsanaṃ karavāva kim
GE09ram_01_u:1643: 1.030.005a evam ukte tatas tābhyāṃ sarva eva maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1648: 1.030.007c adbhutaṃ ca dhanūratnaṃ tatra tvaṃ draṣṭum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:1649: 1.030.008a tad dhi pūrvaṃ naraśreṣṭha dattaṃ sadasi daivataiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1651: 1.030.009a nāsya devā na gandharvā nāsurā na ca rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1652: 1.030.009c kartum āropaṇaṃ śaktā na kathaṃ cana mānuṣāḥ

GE09ram_01_u:1657: 1.030.012a tad dhi yajñaphalaṃ tena maithilenottamaṃ dhanuḥ

GE09ram_01_u:1669: 1.030.018a te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ lambamāne divākare
GE09ram_01_u:1673: 1.030.020a rāmo 'pi sahasaumitrir munīṃs tān abhipūjya ca
GE09ram_01_u:1677: 1.030.022a bhagavan ko nv ayaṃ deśaḥ samṛddhavanaśobhitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1678: 1.030.022c śrotum icchāmi bhadraṃ te vaktum arhasi tattvataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1681: 1.031.001a brahmayonir mahān āsīt kuśo nāma mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1682: 1.031.001c vaidarbhyāṃ janayām āsa caturaḥ sadṛśān sutān
GE09ram_01_u:1683: 1.031.002a kuśāmbaṃ kuśanābhaṃ ca ādhūrta rajasaṃ vasum
GE09ram_01_u:1685: 1.031.002e tān uvāca kuśaḥ putrān dharmiṣṭhān satyavādinaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1687: 1.031.003c niveśaṃ cakrire sarve purāṇāṃ nṛvarās tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1688: 1.031.004a kuśāmbas tu mahātejāḥ kauśāmbīm akarot purīm
GE09ram_01_u:1689: 1.031.004c kuśanābhas tu dharmātmā paraṃ cakre mahodayam
GE09ram_01_u:1691: 1.031.005c cakre puravaraṃ rājā vasuś cakre girivrajam
GE09ram_01_u:1692: 1.031.006a eṣā vasumatī rāma vasos tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1696: 1.031.008a saiṣā hi māgadhī rāma vasos tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1702: 1.031.011a gāyantyo nṛtyamānāś ca vādayantyaś ca rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:1707: 1.031.013c dṛṣṭvā sarvātmako vāyur idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1708: 1.031.014a ahaṃ vaḥ kāmaye sarvā bhāryā mama bhaviṣyatha
GE09ram_01_u:1709: 1.031.014c mānuṣas tyajyatāṃ bhāvo dīrgham āyur avāpsyatha
GE09ram_01_u:1710: 1.031.015a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā vāyor akliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1712: 1.031.016a antaś carasi bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ tvaṃ surottama
GE09ram_01_u:1713: 1.031.016c prabhāvajñāś ca te sarvāḥ kim asmān avamanyase
GE09ram_01_u:1715: 1.031.017c sthānāc cyāvayituṃ devaṃ rakṣāmas tu tapo vayam
GE09ram_01_u:1716: 1.031.018a mā bhūt sa kālo durmedhaḥ pitaraṃ satyavādinam
GE09ram_01_u:1718: 1.031.019a pitā hi prabhur asmākaṃ daivataṃ paramaṃ hi saḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1719: 1.031.019c yasya no dāsyati pitā sa no bhartā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:1720: 1.031.020a tāsāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā vāyuḥ paramakopanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1722: 1.031.021a tāḥ kanyā vāyunā bhagnā viviśur nṛpater gṛham
GE09ram_01_u:1723: 1.031.021c dṛṣṭvā bhagnās tadā rājā saṃbhrānta idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1724: 1.031.022a kim idaṃ kathyatāṃ putryaḥ ko dharmam avamanyate
GE09ram_01_u:1725: 1.031.022c kubjāḥ kena kṛtāḥ sarvā veṣṭantyo nābhibhāṣatha
GE09ram_01_u:1726: 1.032.001a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā kuśanābhasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1729: 1.032.002c aśubhaṃ mārgam āsthāya na dharmaṃ pratyavekṣate
GE09ram_01_u:1730: 1.032.003a pitṛmatyaḥ sma bhadraṃ te svacchande na vayaṃ sthitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1731: 1.032.003c pitaraṃ no vṛṇīṣva tvaṃ yadi no dāsyate tava
GE09ram_01_u:1733: 1.032.004c evaṃ bruvantyaḥ sarvāḥ sma vāyunā nihatā bhṛṣam
GE09ram_01_u:1736: 1.032.006a kṣāntaṃ kṣamāvatāṃ putryaḥ kartavyaṃ sumahat kṛtam
GE09ram_01_u:1738: 1.032.007a alaṃkāro hi nārīṇāṃ kṣamā tu puruṣasya vā
GE09ram_01_u:1739: 1.032.007c duṣkaraṃ tac ca vaḥ kṣāntaṃ tridaśeṣu viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1740: 1.032.008a yādṛśīr vaḥ kṣamā putryaḥ sarvāsām aviśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1741: 1.032.008c kṣamā dānaṃ kṣamā yajñaḥ kṣamā satyaṃ ca putrikāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1742: 1.032.009a kṣamā yaśaḥ kṣamā dharmaḥ kṣamāyāṃ viṣṭhitaṃ jagat
GE09ram_01_u:1744: 1.032.010a mantrajño mantrayām āsa pradānaṃ saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1746: 1.032.011a etasminn eva kāle tu cūlī nāma mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1748: 1.032.012a tapyantaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ tatra gandharvī paryupāsate
GE09ram_01_u:1749: 1.032.012c somadā nāma bhadraṃ te ūrmilā tanayā tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1750: 1.032.013a sā ca taṃ praṇatā bhūtvā śuśrūṣaṇaparāyaṇā
