GE09ram_01_u:1753: 1.032.014c parituṣṭo 'smi bhadraṃ te kiṃ karomi tava priyam
GE09ram_01_u:1757: 1.032.016c brāhmeṇa tapasā yuktaṃ putram icchāmi dhārmikam
GE09ram_01_u:1758: 1.032.017a apatiś cāsmi bhadraṃ te bhāryā cāsmi na kasya cit
GE09ram_01_u:1759: 1.032.017c brāhmeṇopagatāyāś ca dātum arhasi me sutam
GE09ram_01_u:1760: 1.032.018a tasyāḥ prasanno brahmarṣir dadau putram anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:1761: 1.032.018c brahmadatta iti khyātaṃ mānasaṃ cūlinaḥ sutam
GE09ram_01_u:1762: 1.032.019a sa rājā brahmadattas tu purīm adhyavasat tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1763: 1.032.019c kāmpilyāṃ parayā lakṣmyā devarājo yathā divam
GE09ram_01_u:1764: 1.032.020a sa buddhiṃ kṛtavān rājā kuśanābhaḥ sudhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1769: 1.032.022c brahmadatto mahī pālas tāsāṃ devapatir yathā
GE09ram_01_u:1771: 1.032.023c yuktāḥ paramayā lakṣmyā babhuḥ kanyāśataṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1772: 1.032.024a sa dṛṣṭvā vāyunā muktāḥ kuśanābho mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1773: 1.032.024c babhūva paramaprīto harṣaṃ lebhe punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1775: 1.032.025c sadāraṃ preṣayām āsa sopādhyāya gaṇaṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1777: 1.032.026c yathānyāyaṃ ca gandharvī snuṣās tāḥ pratyanandata
GE09ram_01_u:1778: 1.033.001a kṛtodvāhe gate tasmin brahmadatte ca rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:1782: 1.033.003a putras te sadṛśaḥ putra bhaviṣyati sudhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1783: 1.033.003c gādhiṃ prāpsyasi tena tvaṃ kīrtiṃ loke ca śāśvatīm
GE09ram_01_u:1784: 1.033.004a evam uktvā kuśo rāma kuśanābhaṃ mahīpatim
GE09ram_01_u:1786: 1.033.005a kasya cit tv atha kālasya kuśanābhasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1787: 1.033.005c jajñe paramadharmiṣṭho gādhir ity eva nāmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1788: 1.033.006a sa pitā mama kākutstha gādhiḥ paramadhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1790: 1.033.007a pūrvajā bhaginī cāpi mama rāghava suvratā
GE09ram_01_u:1798: 1.033.011a sā tu satyavatī puṇyā satye dharme pratiṣṭhitā
GE09ram_01_u:1800: 1.033.012a ahaṃ hi niyamād rāma hitvā tāṃ samupāgataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1802: 1.033.013a eṣā rāma mamotpattiḥ svasya vaṃśasya kīrtitā
GE09ram_01_u:1803: 1.033.013c deśasya ca mahābāho yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE09ram_01_u:1805: 1.033.014c nidrām abhyehi bhadraṃ te mā bhūd vighno 'dhvanīha naḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1807: 1.033.015c naiśena tamasā vyāptā diśaś ca raghunandana
GE09ram_01_u:1808: 1.033.016a śanair viyujyate saṃdhyā nabho netrair ivāvṛtam
GE09ram_01_u:1811: 1.033.017c hlādayan prāṇināṃ loke manāṃsi prabhayā vibho
GE09ram_01_u:1815: 1.033.019c sādhu sādhv iti taṃ sarve munayo hy abhyapūjayan
GE09ram_01_u:1816: 1.033.020a rāmo 'pi saha saumitriḥ kiṃ cid āgatavismayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1820: 1.034.002a suprabhātā niśā rāma pūrvā saṃdhyā pravartate
GE09ram_01_u:1822: 1.034.003a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya kṛtvā paurvāhṇikīṃ kriyām
GE09ram_01_u:1823: 1.034.003c gamanaṃ rocayām āsa vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:1826: 1.034.005a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa viśvāmitro 'bravīd idam
GE09ram_01_u:1827: 1.034.005c eṣa panthā mayoddiṣṭo yena yānti maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1828: 1.034.006a te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ gate 'rdhadivase tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1832: 1.034.007e tasyās tīre tataś cakrus te āvāsaparigraham
GE09ram_01_u:1838: 1.034.010c bhagavañ śrotum icchāmi gaṅgāṃ tripathagāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_01_u:1841: 1.034.011c vṛddhiṃ janma ca gaṅgāyā vaktum evopacakrame
GE09ram_01_u:1842: 1.034.012a śailendro himavān nāma dhātūnām ākaro mahān
GE09ram_01_u:1843: 1.034.012c tasya kanyā dvayaṃ rāma rūpeṇāpratimaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_01_u:1844: 1.034.013a yā meruduhitā rāma tayor mātā sumadhyamā
GE09ram_01_u:1845: 1.034.013c nāmnā menā manojñā vai patnī himavataḥ priyā
GE09ram_01_u:1846: 1.034.014a tasyāṃ gaṅgeyam abhavaj jyeṣṭhā himavataḥ sutā
GE09ram_01_u:1847: 1.034.014c umā nāma dvitīyābhūt kanyā tasyaiva rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:1849: 1.034.015c śailendraṃ varayām āsur gaṅgāṃ tripathagāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_01_u:1855: 1.034.018c ugraṃ sā vratam āsthāya tapas tepe tapodhanā
GE09ram_01_u:1856: 1.034.019a ugreṇa tapasā yuktāṃ dadau śailavaraḥ sutām
GE09ram_01_u:1858: 1.034.020a ete te śaila rājasya sute lokanamaskṛte
GE09ram_01_u:1859: 1.034.020c gaṅgā ca saritāṃ śreṣṭhā umā devī ca rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:1860: 1.034.021a etat te dharmam ākhyātaṃ yathā tripathagā nadī
GE09ram_01_u:1861: 1.034.021c khaṃ gatā prathamaṃ tāta gatiṃ gatimatāṃ vara
GE09ram_01_u:1862: 1.035.001a ukta vākye munau tasminn ubhau rāghavalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_01_u:1864: 1.035.002a dharmayuktam idaṃ brahman kathitaṃ paramaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_01_u:1867: 1.035.003c trīn patho hetunā kena pāvayel lokapāvanī
GE09ram_01_u:1869: 1.035.004c triṣu lokeṣu dharmajña karmabhiḥ kaiḥ samanvitā
GE09ram_01_u:1875: 1.035.007c na cāpi tanayo rāma tasyām āsīt paraṃtapa
GE09ram_01_u:1877: 1.035.008c yad ihotpadyate bhūtaṃ kas tat pratisahiṣyate
GE09ram_01_u:1881: 1.035.010a na lokā dhārayiṣyanti tava tejaḥ surottama
GE09ram_01_u:1882: 1.035.010c brāhmeṇa tapasā yukto devyā saha tapaś cara
GE09ram_01_u:1884: 1.035.011c rakṣa sarvān imāṃl lokān nālokaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:1886: 1.035.012c bāḍham ity abravīt sarvān punaś cedam uvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:1887: 1.035.013a dhārayiṣyāmy ahaṃ tejas tejasy eva sahomayā
GE09ram_01_u:1889: 1.035.014a yad idaṃ kṣubhitaṃ sthānān mama tejo hy anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:1890: 1.035.014c dhārayiṣyati kas tan me bruvantu surasattamāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1891: 1.035.015a evam uktās tato devāḥ pratyūcur vṛṣabhadhvajam
GE09ram_01_u:1892: 1.035.015c yat tejaḥ kṣubhitaṃ hy etat tad dharā dhārayiṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:1895: 1.035.017a tato devāḥ punar idam ūcuś cātha hutāśanam
GE09ram_01_u:1897: 1.035.018a tad agninā punar vyāptaṃ saṃjātaḥ śvetaparvataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1900: 1.035.019a athomāṃ ca śivaṃ caiva devāḥ sarṣi gaṇās tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1902: 1.035.020a atha śaila sutā rāma tridaśān idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1906: 1.035.021e adya prabhṛti yuṣmākam aprajāḥ santu patnayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1907: 1.035.022a evam uktvā surān sarvāñ śaśāpa pṛthivīm api
GE09ram_01_u:1909: 1.035.023a na ca putrakṛtāṃ prītiṃ matkrodhakaluṣī kṛtā
GE09ram_01_u:1910: 1.035.023c prāpsyasi tvaṃ sudurmedhe mama putram anicchatī
GE09ram_01_u:1911: 1.035.024a tān sarvān vrīḍitān dṛṣṭvā surān surapatis tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1913: 1.035.025a sa gatvā tapa ātiṣṭhat pārśve tasyottare gireḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1915: 1.035.026a eṣa te vistaro rāma śailaputryā niveditaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1916: 1.035.026c gaṅgāyāḥ prabhavaṃ caiva śṛṇu me sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1917: 1.036.001a tapyamāne tapo deve devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ purā
GE09ram_01_u:1921: 1.036.003a yo naḥ senāpatir deva datto bhagavatā purā
GE09ram_01_u:1922: 1.036.003c sa tapaḥ param āsthāya tapyate sma sahomayā
GE09ram_01_u:1924: 1.036.004c saṃvidhatsva vidhānajña tvaṃ hi naḥ paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1926: 1.036.005c sāntvayan madhurair vākyais tridaśān idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1927: 1.036.006a śailaputryā yad uktaṃ tan na prajāsyatha patniṣu
GE09ram_01_u:1928: 1.036.006c tasyā vacanam akliṣṭaṃ satyam eva na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1929: 1.036.007a iyam ākāśagā gaṅgā yasyāṃ putraṃ hutāśanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1932: 1.036.008c umāyās tad bahumataṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1933: 1.036.009a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya kṛtārthā raghunandana
GE09ram_01_u:1935: 1.036.010a te gatvā parvataṃ rāma kailāsaṃ dhātumaṇḍitam
GE09ram_01_u:1940: 1.036.012c garbhaṃ dhāraya vai devi devatānām idaṃ priyam
GE09ram_01_u:1941: 1.036.013a ity etad vacanaṃ śrutvā divyaṃ rūpam adhārayat
GE09ram_01_u:1942: 1.036.013c sa tasyā mahimāṃ dṛṣṭvā samantād avakīryata
GE09ram_01_u:1946: 1.036.015c aśaktā dhāraṇe deva tava tejaḥ samuddhatam
GE09ram_01_u:1950: 1.036.017a śrutvā tv agnivaco gaṅgā taṃ garbham atibhāsvaram
GE09ram_01_u:1953: 1.036.018c kāñcanaṃ dharaṇīṃ prāptaṃ hiraṇyam amalaṃ śubham
GE09ram_01_u:1955: 1.036.019c malaṃ tasyābhavat tatra trapusīsakam eva ca
GE09ram_01_u:1956: 1.036.020a tad etad dharaṇīṃ prāpya nānādhātur avardhata
GE09ram_01_u:1959: 1.036.022a jātarūpam iti khyātaṃ tadā prabhṛti rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:1961: 1.036.023a taṃ kumāraṃ tato jātaṃ sendrāḥ sahamarudgaṇāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1963: 1.036.024a tāḥ kṣīraṃ jātamātrasya kṛtvā samayam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:1964: 1.036.024c daduḥ putro 'yam asmākaṃ sarvāsām iti niścitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1965: 1.036.025a tatas tu devatāḥ sarvāḥ kārtikeya iti bruvan
GE09ram_01_u:1966: 1.036.025c putras trailokya vikhyāto bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1967: 1.036.026a teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā skannaṃ garbhaparisrave
GE09ram_01_u:1969: 1.036.027a skanda ity abruvan devāḥ skannaṃ garbhaparisravāt
GE09ram_01_u:1972: 1.036.028c ṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaḍānano bhūtvā jagrāha stanajaṃ payaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1973: 1.036.029a gṛhītvā kṣīram ekāhnā sukumāra vapus tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1977: 1.036.031a eṣa te rāma gaṅgāyā vistaro 'bhihito mayā
GE09ram_01_u:1978: 1.036.031c kumārasaṃbhavaś caiva dhanyaḥ puṇyas tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:1979: 1.037.001a tāṃ kathāṃ kauśiko rāme nivedya madhurākṣaram
GE09ram_01_u:1980: 1.037.001c punar evāparaṃ vākyaṃ kākutstham idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1982: 1.037.002c sagaro nāma dharmātmā prajākāmaḥ sa cāprajaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1987: 1.037.005a tābhyāṃ saha tadā rājā patnībhyāṃ taptavāṃs tapaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1989: 1.037.006a atha varṣa śate pūrṇe tapasārādhito muniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1990: 1.037.006c sagarāya varaṃ prādād bhṛguḥ satyavatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1993: 1.037.008a ekā janayitā tāta putraṃ vaṃśakaraṃ tava
GE09ram_01_u:1997: 1.037.010a ekaḥ kasyāḥ suto brahman kā bahūñ janayiṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:1998: 1.037.010c śrotum icchāvahe brahman satyam astu vacas tava
GE09ram_01_u:1999: 1.037.011a tayos tad vacanaṃ śrutvā bhṛguḥ parama dhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2001: 1.037.012a eko vaṃśakaro vāstu bahavo vā mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2002: 1.037.012c kīrtimanto mahotsāhāḥ kā vā kaṃ varam icchati
GE09ram_01_u:2003: 1.037.013a munes tu vacanaṃ śrutvā keśinī raghunandana
GE09ram_01_u:2009: 1.037.016a atha kāle gate tasmiñ jyeṣṭhā putraṃ vyajāyata
GE09ram_01_u:2018: 1.037.020c bālān gṛhītvā tu jale sarayvā raghunandana
GE09ram_01_u:2019: 1.037.020e prakṣipya prahasan nityaṃ majjatas tān nirīkṣya vai
GE09ram_01_u:2020: 1.037.021a paurāṇām ahite yuktaḥ pitrā nirvāsitaḥ purāt
GE09ram_01_u:2025: 1.037.024a sa kṛtvā niścayaṃ rājā sopādhyāyagaṇas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:2029: 1.038.002a śrotum ichāmi bhadraṃ te vistareṇa kathām imām
GE09ram_01_u:2030: 1.038.002c pūrvako me kathaṃ brahman yajñaṃ vai samupāharat
GE09ram_01_u:2031: 1.038.003a viśvāmitras tu kākutstham uvāca prahasann iva
GE09ram_01_u:2035: 1.038.005a tayor madhye pravṛtto 'bhūd yajñaḥ sa puruṣottama
GE09ram_01_u:2036: 1.038.005c sa hi deśo naravyāghra praśasto yajñakarmaṇi
GE09ram_01_u:2038: 1.038.006c aṃśumān akarot tāta sagarasya mate sthitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2039: 1.038.007a tasya parvaṇi taṃ yajñaṃ yajamānasya vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2041: 1.038.008a hriyamāṇe tu kākutstha tasminn aśve mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2045: 1.038.010a yajñac chidraṃ bhavaty etat sarveṣām aśivāya naḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2046: 1.038.010c tat tathā kriyatāṃ rājan yathāchidraḥ kratur bhavet
GE09ram_01_u:2047: 1.038.011a upādhyāya vacaḥ śrutvā tasmin sadasi pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2048: 1.038.011c ṣaṣṭiṃ putrasahasrāṇi vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:2049: 1.038.012a gatiṃ putrā na paśyāmi rakṣasāṃ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2051: 1.038.013a tad gacchata vicinvadhvaṃ putrakā bhadram astu vaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2057: 1.038.016c iha sthāsyāmi bhadraṃ vo yāvat turagadarśanam
GE09ram_01_u:2062: 1.038.019a śūlair aśanikalpaiś ca halaiś cāpi sudāruṇaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2078: 1.039.001a devatānāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā bhagavān vai pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2081: 1.039.002c kāpilaṃ rūpam āsthāya dhārayaty aniśaṃ dharām
GE09ram_01_u:2082: 1.039.003a pṛthivyāś cāpi nirbhedo dṛṣṭa eva sanātanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2086: 1.039.005a sagarasya ca putrāṇāṃ prādur āsīn mahātmanām
GE09ram_01_u:2088: 1.039.006a tato bhittvā mahīṃ sarvāṃ kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_01_u:2089: 1.039.006c sahitāḥ sagarāḥ sarve pitaraṃ vākyam abruvan
GE09ram_01_u:2090: 1.039.007a parikrāntā mahī sarvā sattvavantaś ca sūditāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2092: 1.039.008a na ca paśyāmahe 'śvaṃ tam aśvahartāram eva ca
GE09ram_01_u:2093: 1.039.008c kiṃ kariṣyāma bhadraṃ te buddhir atra vicāryatām
GE09ram_01_u:2094: 1.039.009a teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā putrāṇāṃ rājasattamaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2096: 1.039.010a bhūyaḥ khanata bhadraṃ vo nirbhidya vasudhātalam
GE09ram_01_u:2105: 1.039.014c khedāc cālayate śīrṣaṃ bhūmikampas tadhā bhavet
GE09ram_01_u:2106: 1.039.015a taṃ te pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā diśāpālaṃ mahāgajam
GE09ram_01_u:2107: 1.039.015c mānayanto hi te rāma jagmur bhittvā rasātalam
GE09ram_01_u:2108: 1.039.016a tataḥ pūrvāṃ diśaṃ bhittvā dakṣiṇāṃ bibhiduḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2109: 1.039.016c dakṣiṇasyām api diśi dadṛśus te mahāgajam
GE09ram_01_u:2111: 1.039.017c śirasā dhārayantaṃ te vismayaṃ jagmur uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:2116: 1.039.020a taṃ te pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā pṛṣṭvā cāpi nirāmayam
GE09ram_01_u:2119: 1.039.021c bhadraṃ bhadreṇa vapuṣā dhārayantaṃ mahīm imām
GE09ram_01_u:2120: 1.039.022a samālabhya tataḥ sarve kṛtvā cainaṃ pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_01_u:2122: 1.039.023a tataḥ prāguttarāṃ gatvā sāgarāḥ prathitāṃ diśam
GE09ram_01_u:2125: 1.039.024c hayaṃ ca tasya devasya carantam avidūrataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2128: 1.039.026a asmākaṃ tvaṃ hi turagaṃ yajñiyaṃ hṛtavān asi
GE09ram_01_u:2129: 1.039.026c durmedhas tvaṃ hi saṃprāptān viddhi naḥ sagarātmajān
GE09ram_01_u:2130: 1.039.027a śrutvā tad vacanaṃ teṣāṃ kapilo raghunandana
GE09ram_01_u:2136: 1.040.002a śūraś ca kṛtavidyaś ca pūrvais tulyo 'si tejasā
GE09ram_01_u:2139: 1.040.003c teṣāṃ tvaṃ pratighātārthaṃ sāsiṃ gṛhṇīṣva kārmukam
GE09ram_01_u:2143: 1.040.005c dhanur ādāya khaḍgaṃ ca jagāma laghuvikramaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2144: 1.040.006a sa khātaṃ pitṛbhir mārgam antarbhaumaṃ mahātmabhiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2148: 1.040.008a sa taṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā pṛṣṭvā caiva nirāmayam
GE09ram_01_u:2149: 1.040.008c pitḥn sa paripapraccha vājihartāram eva ca
GE09ram_01_u:2150: 1.040.009a diśāgajas tu tac chrutvā prītyāhāṃśumato vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2152: 1.040.010a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā sarvān eva diśāgajān
GE09ram_01_u:2154: 1.040.011a taiś ca sarvair diśāpālair vākyajñair vākyakovidaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2156: 1.040.012a teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā jagāma laghuvikramaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2158: 1.040.013a sa duḥkhavaśam āpannas tv asamañjasutas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:2159: 1.040.013c cukrośa paramārtas tu vadhāt teṣāṃ suduḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2160: 1.040.014a yajñiyaṃ ca hayaṃ tatra carantam avidūrataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2166: 1.040.017a sa cainam abravīd vākyaṃ vainateyo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2169: 1.040.018c salilaṃ nārhasi prājña dātum eṣāṃ hi laukikam
GE09ram_01_u:2172: 1.040.020a tayā klinnam idaṃ bhasma gaṅgayā lokakāntayā
GE09ram_01_u:2177: 1.040.022c tvaritaṃ hayam ādāya punar āyān mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2180: 1.040.024a tac chrutvā ghorasaṃkāśaṃ vākyam aṃśumato nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2184: 1.040.026a agatvā niścayaṃ rājā kālena mahatā mahān
GE09ram_01_u:2188: 1.041.002a sa rājā sumahān āsīd aṃśumān raghunandana
GE09ram_01_u:2189: 1.041.002c tasya putro mahān āsīd dilīpa iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2194: 1.041.005a dilīpas tu mahātejāḥ śrutvā paitāmahaṃ vadham
GE09ram_01_u:2197: 1.041.006c tārayeyaṃ kathaṃ caitān iti cintā paro 'bhavat
GE09ram_01_u:2200: 1.041.008a dilīpas tu mahātejā yajñair bahubhir iṣṭavān
GE09ram_01_u:2202: 1.041.009a agatvā niścayaṃ rājā teṣām uddharaṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_01_u:2208: 1.041.012a sa tapo dīrgham ātiṣṭhad gokarṇe raghunandana
GE09ram_01_u:2211: 1.041.013c suprīto bhagavān brahmā prajānāṃ patir īśvaraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2215: 1.041.015c tapasā ca sutaptena varaṃ varaya suvrata
GE09ram_01_u:2218: 1.041.017a yṛadi me bhagavān prīto yady asti tapasaḥ phalam
GE09ram_01_u:2221: 1.041.018c svargaṃ gaccheyur atyantaṃ sarve me prapitāmahāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2222: 1.041.019a deyā ca saṃtator deva nāvasīdet kulaṃ ca naḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2223: 1.041.019c ikṣvākūṇāṃ kule deva eṣa me 'stu varaḥ paraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2228: 1.041.022a iyaṃ haimavatī gaṅgā jyeṣṭhā himavataḥ sutā
GE09ram_01_u:2229: 1.041.022c tāṃ vai dhārayituṃ rājan haras tatra niyujyatām
GE09ram_01_u:2230: 1.041.023a gaṅgāyāḥ patanaṃ rājan pṛthivī na sahiṣyate
GE09ram_01_u:2231: 1.041.023c tau vai dhārayituṃ vīra nānyaṃ paśyāmi śūlinaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2232: 1.041.024a tam evam uktvā rājānaṃ gaṅgāṃ cābhāṣya lokakṛt
GE09ram_01_u:2233: 1.041.024c jagāma tridivaṃ devaḥ saha sarvair marudgaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2238: 1.042.003a prītas te 'haṃ naraśreṣṭha kariṣyāmi tava priyam
GE09ram_01_u:2241: 1.042.004c tadā sātimahad rūpaṃ kṛtvā vegaṃ ca duḥsaham
GE09ram_01_u:2242: 1.042.004e ākāśād apatad rāma śive śivaśirasy uta
GE09ram_01_u:2246: 1.042.006c visasarja tato gaṅgāṃ haro bindusaraḥ prati
GE09ram_01_u:2250: 1.042.008c vyalokayanta te tatra gaganād gāṃ gatāṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:2253: 1.042.010a tad adbhutatamaṃ loke gaṅgā patanam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:2258: 1.042.012c vidyudbhir iva vikṣiptair ākāśam abhavat tadā
GE09ram_01_u:2261: 1.042.014a kva cid drutataraṃ yāti kuṭilaṃ kva cid āyatam
GE09ram_01_u:2262: 1.042.014c vinataṃ kva cid uddhūtaṃ kva cid yāti śanaiḥ śanaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2263: 1.042.015a salilenaiva salilaṃ kva cid abhyāhataṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2264: 1.042.015c muhur ūrdhvapathaṃ gatvā papāta vasudhāṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2269: 1.042.018a śāpāt prapatitā ye ca gaganād vasudhātalam
GE09ram_01_u:2272: 1.042.019c punar ākāśam āviśya svāṃl lokān pratipedire
GE09ram_01_u:2273: 1.042.020a mumude mudito lokas tena toyena bhāsvatā
GE09ram_01_u:2276: 1.042.021c prāyād agre mahātejās taṃ gaṅgā pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt
GE09ram_01_u:2280: 1.042.023c gaṅgām anvagaman prītāḥ sarve jalacarāś ca ye
GE09ram_01_u:2281: 1.042.024a yato bhagīratho rājā tato gaṅgā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_01_u:2283: 1.043.001a sa gatvā sāgaraṃ rājā gaṅgayānugatas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:2284: 1.043.001c praviveśa talaṃ bhūmer yatra te bhasmasātkṛtāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2285: 1.043.002a bhasmany athāplute rāma gaṅgāyāḥ salilena vai
GE09ram_01_u:2286: 1.043.002c sarva lokaprabhur brahmā rājānam idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:2287: 1.043.003a tāritā naraśārdūla divaṃ yātāś ca devavat
GE09ram_01_u:2289: 1.043.004a sāgarasya jalaṃ loke yāvat sthāsyati pārthiva
GE09ram_01_u:2291: 1.043.005a iyaṃ ca duhitā jyeṣṭhā tava gaṅgā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:2292: 1.043.005c tvatkṛtena ca nāmnā vai loke sthāsyati viśrutā
GE09ram_01_u:2293: 1.043.006a gaṅgā tripathagā nāma divyā bhāgīrathīti ca
GE09ram_01_u:2297: 1.043.008a pūrvakeṇa hi te rājaṃs tenātiyaśasā tadā
GE09ram_01_u:2304: 1.043.011c punar na śaṅkitā netuṃ gaṅgāṃ prārthayatānagha
GE09ram_01_u:2307: 1.043.013a yac ca gaṅgāvataraṇaṃ tvayā kṛtam ariṃdama
GE09ram_01_u:2308: 1.043.013c anena ca bhavān prāpto dharmasyāyatanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_01_u:2312: 1.043.015c svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmi svaṃ lokaṃ gamyatāṃ nṛpa
GE09ram_01_u:2317: 1.043.017e kṛtodakaḥ śucī rājā svapuraṃ praviveśa ha
GE09ram_01_u:2319: 1.043.018c pramumoda ca lokas taṃ nṛpam āsādya rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:2321: 1.043.019a eṣa te rāma gaṅgāyā vistaro 'bhihito mayā
GE09ram_01_u:2323: 1.043.020a dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ svargyaṃ putryam athāpi ca
GE09ram_01_u:2327: 1.044.002a atyadbhutam idaṃ brahman kathitaṃ paramaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_01_u:2329: 1.044.003a tasya sā śarvarī sarvā saha saumitriṇā tadā
GE09ram_01_u:2333: 1.044.005a gatā bhagavatī rātriḥ śrotavyaṃ paramaṃ śrutam
GE09ram_01_u:2335: 1.044.005e imāṃ cintayataḥ sarvāṃ nikhilena kathāṃ tava
GE09ram_01_u:2336: 1.044.006a tarāma saritāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ puṇyāṃ tripathagāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_01_u:2337: 1.044.006c naur eṣā hi sukhāstīrṇā ṛṣīṇāṃ puṇyakarmaṇām
GE09ram_01_u:2338: 1.044.006e bhagavantam iha prāptaṃ jñātvā tvaritam āgatā
GE09ram_01_u:2339: 1.044.007a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2342: 1.044.008c gaṅgākūle niviṣṭās te viśālāṃ dadṛśuḥ purīm
GE09ram_01_u:2344: 1.044.009c viśālāṃ nagarīṃ ramyāṃ divyāṃ svargopamāṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:2346: 1.044.010c papraccha prāñjalir bhūtvā viśālām uttamāṃ purīm
GE09ram_01_u:2348: 1.044.011c śrotum icchāmi bhadraṃ te paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE09ram_01_u:2349: 1.044.012a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rāmasya munipuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2351: 1.044.013a śrūyatāṃ rāma śakrasya kathāṃ kathayataḥ śubhām
GE09ram_01_u:2352: 1.044.013c asmin deśe hi yad vṛttaṃ śṛṇu tattvena rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:2353: 1.044.014a pūrvaṃ kṛtayuge rāma diteḥ putrā mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2355: 1.044.015a tatas teṣāṃ naraśreṣṭha buddhir āsīn mahātmanām
GE09ram_01_u:2356: 1.044.015c amarā nirjarāś caiva kathaṃ syāma nirāmayāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2357: 1.044.016a teṣāṃ cintayatāṃ rāma buddhir āsīd vipaścitām
GE09ram_01_u:2358: 1.044.016c kṣīrodamathanaṃ kṛtvā rasaṃ prāpsyāma tatra vai
GE09ram_01_u:2359: 1.044.017a tato niścitya mathanaṃ yoktraṃ kṛtvā ca vāsukim
GE09ram_01_u:2361: 1.044.018a atha dhanvantarir nāma apsarāś ca suvarcasaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2362: 1.044.018c apsu nirmathanād eva rasāt tasmād varastriyaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2365: 1.044.019c asaṃkhyeyās tu kākutstha yās tāsāṃ paricārikāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2366: 1.044.020a na tāḥ sma pratigṛhṇanti sarve te devadānavāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2370: 1.044.022a diteḥ putrā na tāṃ rāma jagṛhur varuṇātmajām
GE09ram_01_u:2371: 1.044.022c adites tu sutā vīra jagṛhus tām aninditām
GE09ram_01_u:2372: 1.044.023a asurās tena daiteyāḥ surās tenāditeḥ sutāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2373: 1.044.023c hṛṣṭāḥ pramuditāś cāsan vāruṇī grahaṇāt surāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2376: 1.044.025a atha tasya kṛte rāma mahān āsīt kulakṣayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2377: 1.044.025c adites tu tataḥ putrā diteḥ putrāṇa sūdayan
GE09ram_01_u:2378: 1.044.026a aditer ātmajā vīrā diteḥ putrān nijaghnire
GE09ram_01_u:2380: 1.044.027a nihatya ditiputrāṃs tu rājyaṃ prāpya puraṃdaraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2383: 1.045.001c mārīcaṃ kāśyapaṃ rāma bhartāram idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:2386: 1.045.003a sāhaṃ tapaś cariṣyāmi garbhaṃ me dātum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:2388: 1.045.004a tasyās tadvacanaṃ śrutvā mārīcaḥ kāśyapas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:2390: 1.045.005a evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ te śucir bhava tapodhane
GE09ram_01_u:2391: 1.045.005c janayiṣyasi putraṃ tvaṃ śakra hantāram āhave
GE09ram_01_u:2392: 1.045.006a pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu śucir yadi bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_01_u:2393: 1.045.006c putraṃ trailokya hantāraṃ mattas tvaṃ janayiṣyasi
GE09ram_01_u:2394: 1.045.007a evam uktvā mahātejāḥ pāṇinā sa mamārja tām
GE09ram_01_u:2395: 1.045.007c samālabhya tataḥ svastīty uktvā sa tapase yayau
GE09ram_01_u:2398: 1.045.009a tapas tasyāṃ hi kurvatyāṃ paricaryāṃ cakāra ha
GE09ram_01_u:2400: 1.045.010a agniṃ kuśān kāṣṭham apaḥ phalaṃ mūlaṃ tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:2401: 1.045.010c nyavedayat sahasrākṣo yac cānyad api kāṅkṣitam
GE09ram_01_u:2403: 1.045.011c śakraḥ sarveṣu kāleṣu ditiṃ paricacāra ha
GE09ram_01_u:2406: 1.045.013a tapaś carantyā varṣāṇi daśa vīryavatāṃ vara
GE09ram_01_u:2407: 1.045.013c avaśiṣṭāni bhadraṃ te bhrātaraṃ drakṣyase tataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2408: 1.045.014a tam ahaṃ tvatkṛte putra samādhāsye jayotsukam
GE09ram_01_u:2410: 1.045.015a evam uktvā ditiḥ śakraṃ prāpte madhyaṃ divākare
GE09ram_01_u:2412: 1.045.016a dṛṣṭvā tām aśuciṃ śakraḥ pādataḥ kṛtamūrdhajām
GE09ram_01_u:2413: 1.045.016c śiraḥsthāne kṛtau pādau jahāsa ca mumoda ca
GE09ram_01_u:2415: 1.045.017c garbhaṃ ca saptadhā rāma bibheda paramātmavān
GE09ram_01_u:2417: 1.045.018c ruroda susvaraṃ rāma tato ditir abudhyata
GE09ram_01_u:2418: 1.045.019a mā rudo mā rudaś ceti garbhaṃ śakro 'bhyabhāṣata
GE09ram_01_u:2419: 1.045.019c bibheda ca mahātejā rudantam api vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2420: 1.045.020a na hantavyo na hantavya ity evaṃ ditir abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:2425: 1.045.022c abhindaṃ saptadhā devi tan me tvaṃ kṣantum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:2426: 1.046.001a saptadhā tu kṛte garbhe ditiḥ paramaduḥkhitā
GE09ram_01_u:2430: 1.046.003a priyaṃ tu kṛtam icchāmi mama garbhaviparyaye
GE09ram_01_u:2431: 1.046.003c marutāṃ saptaṃ saptānāṃ sthānapālā bhavantv ime
GE09ram_01_u:2432: 1.046.004a vātaskandhā ime sapta carantu divi putrakāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2435: 1.046.005c divi vāyur iti khyātas tṛtīyo 'pi mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2436: 1.046.006a catvāras tu suraśreṣṭha diśo vai tava śāsanāt
GE09ram_01_u:2438: 1.046.006e tvatkṛtenaiva nāmnā ca mārutā iti viśrutāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2441: 1.046.008a sarvam etad yathoktaṃ te bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2443: 1.046.009a evaṃ tau niścayaṃ kṛtvā mātāputrau tapovane
GE09ram_01_u:2444: 1.046.009c jagmatus tridivaṃ rāma kṛtārthāv iti naḥ śrutam
GE09ram_01_u:2445: 1.046.010a eṣa deśaḥ sa kākutstha mahendrādhyuṣitaḥ purā
GE09ram_01_u:2446: 1.046.010c ditiṃ yatra tapaḥ siddhām evaṃ paricacāra saḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2449: 1.046.012a tena cāsīd iha sthāne viśāleti purī kṛtā
GE09ram_01_u:2457: 1.046.016c somadattasya putras tu kākutstha iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2458: 1.046.017a tasya putro mahātejāḥ saṃpraty eṣa purīm imām
GE09ram_01_u:2460: 1.046.018a ikṣvākos tu prasādena sarve vaiśālikā nṛpāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2462: 1.046.019a ihādya rajanīṃ rāma sukhaṃ vatsyāmahe vayam
GE09ram_01_u:2463: 1.046.019c śvaḥ prabhāte naraśreṣṭha janakaṃ draṣṭum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:2466: 1.046.021a pūjāṃ ca paramāṃ kṛtvā sopādhyāyaḥ sabāndhavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2468: 1.046.022a dhanyo 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi yasya me viṣayaṃ mune
GE09ram_01_u:2469: 1.046.022c saṃprāpto darśanaṃ caiva nāsti dhanyataro mama
GE09ram_01_u:2477: 1.047.004c kathaṃ padbhyām iha prāptau kimarthaṃ kasya vā mune
GE09ram_01_u:2480: 1.047.006a kimarthaṃ ca naraśreṣṭhau saṃprāptau durgame pathi
GE09ram_01_u:2482: 1.047.007a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā yathāvṛtthaṃ nyavedayat
GE09ram_01_u:2485: 1.047.008c atithī paramau prāptau putrau daśarathasya tau
GE09ram_01_u:2488: 1.047.009c uṣya tatra niśām ekāṃ jagmatur mithilāṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2489: 1.047.010a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā munayaḥ sarve janakasya purīṃ śubhām
GE09ram_01_u:2490: 1.047.010c sādhu sādhv iti śaṃsanto mithilāṃ samapūjayan
GE09ram_01_u:2494: 1.047.012c śrotum icchāmi bhagavan kasyāyaṃ pūrva āśramaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2495: 1.047.013a tac chrutā rāghaveṇoktaṃ vākyaṃ vākya viśāradaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2497: 1.047.014a hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu tattvena rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:2501: 1.047.016a sa ceha tapa ātiṣṭhad ahalyāsahitaḥ purā
GE09ram_01_u:2506: 1.047.018c saṃgamaṃ tv aham icchāmi tvayā saha sumadhyame
GE09ram_01_u:2510: 1.047.020c kṛtārtho 'si suraśreṣṭha gaccha śīghram itaḥ prabho
GE09ram_01_u:2511: 1.047.020e ātmānaṃ māṃ ca deveśa sarvadā rakṣa mānadaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2512: 1.047.021a indras tu prahasan vākyam ahalyām idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:2514: 1.047.022a evaṃ saṃgamya tu tayā niścakrāmoṭajāt tataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2515: 1.047.022c sa saṃbhramāt tvaran rāma śaṅkito gautamaṃ prati
GE09ram_01_u:2523: 1.047.026a mama rūpaṃ samāsthāya kṛtavān asi durmate
GE09ram_01_u:2524: 1.047.026c akartavyam idaṃ yasmād viphalas tvaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:2527: 1.047.028a tathā śaptvā sa vai śakraṃ bhāryām api ca śaptavān
GE09ram_01_u:2531: 1.047.030a yadā caitad vanaṃ ghoraṃ rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2534: 1.047.031c matsakāśe mudā yuktā svaṃ vapur dhārayiṣyasi
GE09ram_01_u:2538: 1.048.001a aphalas tu tataḥ śakro devān agnipurogamān
GE09ram_01_u:2541: 1.048.002c krodham utpādya hi mayā surakāryam idaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_01_u:2542: 1.048.003a aphalo 'smi kṛtas tena krodhāt sā ca nirākṛtā
GE09ram_01_u:2544: 1.048.004a tan māṃ suravarāḥ sarve sarṣisaṃghāḥ sacāraṇāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2548: 1.048.006a ayaṃ meṣaḥ savṛṣaṇaḥ śakro hy avṛṣaṇaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2550: 1.048.007a aphalas tu kṛto meṣaḥ parāṃ tuṣṭiṃ pradāsyati
GE09ram_01_u:2551: 1.048.007c bhavatāṃ harṣaṇārthāya ye ca dāsyanti mānavāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2552: 1.048.008a agnes tu vacanaṃ śrutvā pitṛdevāḥ samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2555: 1.048.009c aphalān bhuñjate meṣān phalais teṣām ayojayan
GE09ram_01_u:2556: 1.048.010a indras tu meṣavṛṣaṇas tadā prabhṛti rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:2564: 1.048.014a prayatnān nirmitāṃ dhātrā divyāṃ māyāmayīm iva
GE09ram_01_u:2568: 1.048.016a sa hi gautamavākyena durnirīkṣyā babhūva ha
GE09ram_01_u:2569: 1.048.016c trayāṇām api lokānāṃ yāvad rāmasya darśanam
GE09ram_01_u:2570: 1.048.017a rāghavau tu tatas tasyāḥ pādau jagṛhatus tadā
GE09ram_01_u:2571: 1.048.017c smarantī gautamavacaḥ pratijagrāha sā ca tau
GE09ram_01_u:2576: 1.048.020a sādhu sādhv iti devās tām ahalyāṃ samapūjayan
GE09ram_01_u:2579: 1.048.021c rāmaṃ saṃpūjya vidhivat tapas tepe mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2581: 1.048.022c sakāśād vidhivat prāpya jagāma mithilāṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2582: 1.049.001a tataḥ prāguttarāṃ gatvā rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_01_u:2589: 1.049.004c deśo vidhīyatāṃ brahman yatra vatsyāmahe vayam
GE09ram_01_u:2592: 1.049.006a viśvāmitraṃ muniśreṣṭhaṃ śrutvā sa nṛpatis tadā
GE09ram_01_u:2594: 1.049.007a ṛtvijo 'pi mahātmānas tv arghyam ādāya satvaram
GE09ram_01_u:2596: 1.049.008a pratigṛhya tu tāṃ pūjāṃ janakasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2597: 1.049.008c papraccha kuśalaṃ rājño yajñasya ca nirāmayam
GE09ram_01_u:2598: 1.049.009a sa tāṃś cāpi munīn pṛṣṭvā sopādhyāya purodhasaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2603: 1.049.011c purodhā ṛtvijaś caiva rājā ca saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2605: 1.049.012c dṛṣṭvā sa nṛpatis tatra viśvāmitram athābravīt
GE09ram_01_u:2606: 1.049.013a adya yajñasamṛddhir me saphalā daivataiḥ kṛtā
GE09ram_01_u:2610: 1.049.015a dvādaśāhaṃ tu brahmarṣe śeṣam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2611: 1.049.015c tato bhāgārthino devān draṣṭum arhasi kauśika
GE09ram_01_u:2613: 1.049.016c punas taṃ paripapraccha prāñjaliḥ prayato nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2619: 1.049.019c kathaṃ padbhyām iha prāptau kimarthaṃ kasya vā mune
GE09ram_01_u:2627: 1.049.023c tac cāgamanam avyagraṃ viśālāyāś ca darśanam
GE09ram_01_u:2636: 1.050.003a sa tau niṣaṇṇau saṃprekṣya sukhāsīnau nṛpātmajau
GE09ram_01_u:2638: 1.050.004a api te muniśārdūla mama mātā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_01_u:2640: 1.050.005a api rāme mahātejo mama mātā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_01_u:2644: 1.050.007a api kauśika bhadraṃ te guruṇā mama saṃgatā
GE09ram_01_u:2646: 1.050.008a api me guruṇā rāmaḥ pūjitaḥ kuśikātmaja
GE09ram_01_u:2648: 1.050.009a api śāntena manasā gurur me kuśikātmaja
GE09ram_01_u:2650: 1.050.010a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2652: 1.050.011a nātikrāntaṃ muniśreṣṭha yat kartavyaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā
GE09ram_01_u:2654: 1.050.012a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2656: 1.050.013a svāgataṃ te naraśreṣṭha diṣṭyā prāpto 'si rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:2659: 1.050.014c viśvāmitro mahātejā vetsy enaṃ paramāṃ gatim
GE09ram_01_u:2660: 1.050.015a nāsti dhanyataro rāma tvatto 'nyo bhuvi kaś cana
GE09ram_01_u:2661: 1.050.015c goptā kuśikaputras te yena taptaṃ mahat tapaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2663: 1.050.016c yathābalaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
GE09ram_01_u:2664: 1.050.017a rājābhūd eṣa dharmātmā dīrgha kālam ariṃdamaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2665: 1.050.017c dharmajñaḥ kṛtavidyaś ca prajānāṃ ca hite rataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2666: 1.050.018a prajāpatisutas tv āsīt kuśo nāma mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2668: 1.050.019a kuśanābhasutas tv āsīd gādhir ity eva viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2672: 1.050.021a kadā cit tu mahātejā yojayitvā varūthinīm
GE09ram_01_u:2674: 1.050.022a nagarāṇi ca rāṣṭrāṇi saritaś ca tathā girīn
GE09ram_01_u:2689: 1.051.001c praṇato vinayād vīro vasiṣṭhaṃ japatāṃ varam
GE09ram_01_u:2690: 1.051.002a svāgataṃ tava cety ukto vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:2691: 1.051.002c āsanaṃ cāsya bhagavān vasiṣṭho vyādideśa ha
GE09ram_01_u:2694: 1.051.004a pratigṛhya ca tāṃ pūjāṃ vasiṣṭhād rājasattamaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2699: 1.051.006c papraccha japatāṃ śreṣṭho vasiṣṭho brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2700: 1.051.007a kaccit te kuśalaṃ rājan kaccid dharmeṇa rañjayan
GE09ram_01_u:2702: 1.051.008a kaccit te subhṛtā bhṛtyāḥ kaccit tiṣṭhanti śāsane
GE09ram_01_u:2703: 1.051.008c kaccit te vijitāḥ sarve ripavo ripusūdana
GE09ram_01_u:2704: 1.051.009a kaccid bale ca kośe ca mitreṣu ca paraṃtapa
GE09ram_01_u:2708: 1.051.011a kṛtvobhau suciraṃ kālaṃ dharmiṣṭhau tāḥ kathāḥ śubhāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2709: 1.051.011c mudā paramayā yuktau prīyetāṃ tau parasparam
GE09ram_01_u:2711: 1.051.012c viśvāmitram idaṃ vākyam uvāca prahasann iva
GE09ram_01_u:2714: 1.051.014a satkriyāṃ tu bhavān etāṃ pratīcchatu mayodyatām
GE09ram_01_u:2717: 1.051.015c kṛtam ity abravīd rājā pūjāvākyena me tvayā
GE09ram_01_u:2722: 1.051.018a evaṃ bruvantaṃ rājānaṃ vasiṣṭhaḥ punar eva hi
GE09ram_01_u:2724: 1.051.019a bāḍham ity eva gādheyo vasiṣṭhaṃ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:2726: 1.051.020a evam ukto mahātejā vasiṣṭho japatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2728: 1.051.021a ehy ehi śabale kṣipraṃ śṛṇu cāpi vaco mama
GE09ram_01_u:2732: 1.051.022c tat sarvaṃ kāmadhug divye abhivarṣakṛte mama
GE09ram_01_u:2734: 1.051.023c annānāṃ nicayaṃ sarvaṃ sṛjasva śabale tvara
GE09ram_01_u:2736: 1.052.001c vidadhe kāmadhuk kāmān yasya yasya yathepsitam
GE09ram_01_u:2737: 1.052.002a ikṣūn madhūṃs tathā lājān maireyāṃś ca varāsavān
GE09ram_01_u:2738: 1.052.002c pānāni ca mahārhāṇi bhakṣyāṃś coccāvacāṃs tathā
GE09ram_01_u:2740: 1.052.003c mṛṣṭānnāni ca sūpāś ca dadhikulyās tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:2748: 1.052.007c yuktaḥ pareṇa harṣeṇa vasiṣṭham idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:2752: 1.052.009c ratnaṃ hi bhagavann etad ratnahārī ca pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2753: 1.052.009e tasmān me śabalāṃ dehi mamaiṣā dharmato dvija
GE09ram_01_u:2754: 1.052.010a evam uktas tu bhagavān vasiṣṭho munisattamaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2757: 1.052.011c rājan dāsyāmi śabalāṃ rāśibhī rajatasya vā
GE09ram_01_u:2759: 1.052.012c śāśvatī śabalā mahyaṃ kīrtir ātmavato yathā
GE09ram_01_u:2760: 1.052.013a asyāṃ havyaṃ ca kavyaṃ ca prāṇayātrā tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:2761: 1.052.013c āyattam agnihotraṃ ca balir homas tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:2763: 1.052.014c āyattam atra rājarṣe sarvam etan na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2764: 1.052.015a sarva svam etat satyena mama tuṣṭikarī sadā
GE09ram_01_u:2765: 1.052.015c kāraṇair bahubhī rājan na dāsye śabalāṃ tava
GE09ram_01_u:2773: 1.052.019c sahasram ekaṃ daśa ca dadāmi tava suvrata
GE09ram_01_u:2775: 1.052.020c dadāmy ekāṃ gavāṃ koṭiṃ śabalā dīyatāṃ mama
GE09ram_01_u:2776: 1.052.021a evam uktas tu bhagavān viśvāmitreṇa dhīmatā
GE09ram_01_u:2777: 1.052.021c na dāsyāmīti śabalāṃ prāha rājan kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_01_u:2778: 1.052.022a etad eva hi me ratnam etad eva hi me dhanam
GE09ram_01_u:2779: 1.052.022c etad eva hi sarvasvam etad eva hi jīvitam
GE09ram_01_u:2780: 1.052.023a darśaś ca pūrṇamāsaś ca yajñāś caivāptadakṣiṇāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2781: 1.052.023c etad eva hi me rājan vividhāś ca kriyās tathā
GE09ram_01_u:2782: 1.052.024a adomūlāḥ kriyāḥ sarvā mama rājan na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2783: 1.052.024c bahūnāṃ kiṃ pralāpena na dāsye kāmadohinīm
GE09ram_01_u:2784: 1.053.001a kāmadhenuṃ vasiṣṭho 'pi yadā na tyajate muniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2786: 1.053.002a nīyamānā tu śabalā rāma rājñā mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:2791: 1.053.004c yan mām anāgasaṃ bhaktām iṣṭāṃ tyajati dhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2792: 1.053.005a iti sā cintayitvā tu niḥśvasya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2794: 1.053.006a nirdhūya tāṃs tadā bhṛtyāñ śataśaḥ śatrusūdana
GE09ram_01_u:2796: 1.053.007a śabalā sā rudantī ca krośantī cedam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:2798: 1.053.008a bhagavan kiṃ parityaktā tvayāhaṃ brahmaṇaḥ suta
GE09ram_01_u:2799: 1.053.008c yasmād rājabhṛtā māṃ hi nayante tvatsakāśataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2800: 1.053.009a evam uktas tu brahmarṣir idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:2802: 1.053.010a na tvāṃ tyajāmi śabale nāpi me 'pakṛtaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_01_u:2803: 1.053.010c eṣa tvāṃ nayate rājā balān matto mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2804: 1.053.011a na hi tulyaṃ balaṃ mahyaṃ rājā tv adya viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2805: 1.053.011c balī rājā kṣatriyaś ca pṛthivyāḥ patir eva ca
GE09ram_01_u:2811: 1.053.014c brahman brahmabalaṃ divyaṃ kṣatrāt tu balavattaram
GE09ram_01_u:2815: 1.053.016c tasya darpaṃ balaṃ yat tan nāśayāmi durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2816: 1.053.017a ity uktas tu tayā rāma vasiṣṭhaḥ sumahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2821: 1.053.019c pahlavān nāśayām āsa śastrair uccāvacair api
GE09ram_01_u:2824: 1.053.021a tair āsīt saṃvṛtā bhūmiḥ śakair yavanamiśritaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2827: 1.053.022c nirdagdhaṃ tad balaṃ sarvaṃ pradīptair iva pāvakaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2830: 1.054.001c vasiṣṭhaś codayām āsa kāmadhuk sṛja yogataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2832: 1.054.002c ūdhasas tv atha saṃjātāḥ pahlavāḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2833: 1.054.003a yonideśāc ca yavanaḥ śakṛddeśāc chakās tathā
GE09ram_01_u:2835: 1.054.004a tais tan niṣūditaṃ sainyaṃ viśvamitrasya tatkṣaṇāt
GE09ram_01_u:2840: 1.054.006c huṃkāreṇaiva tān sarvān nirdadāha mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2843: 1.054.008a dṛṣṭvā vināśitān putrān balaṃ ca sumahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2849: 1.054.011a sa putram ekaṃ rājyāya pālayeti niyujya ca
GE09ram_01_u:2853: 1.054.013a kena cit tv atha kālena deveśo vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2855: 1.054.014a kimarthaṃ tapyase rājan brūhi yat te vivakṣitam
GE09ram_01_u:2856: 1.054.014c varado 'smi varo yas te kāṅkṣitaḥ so 'bhidhīyatām
GE09ram_01_u:2857: 1.054.015a evam uktas tu devena viśvāmitro mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2864: 1.054.018c evam astv iti deveśo vākyam uktvā divaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2868: 1.054.020c hatam eva tadā mene vasiṣṭham ṛṣisattamam
GE09ram_01_u:2870: 1.054.021c yais tat tapovanaṃ sarvaṃ nirdagdhaṃ cāstratejasā
GE09ram_01_u:2872: 1.054.022c dṛṣṭvā vipradrutā bhītā munayaḥ śataśo diśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2873: 1.054.023a vasiṣṭhasya ca ye śiṣyās tathaiva mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2877: 1.054.025a vadato vai vasiṣṭhasya mā bhaiṣṭeti muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2878: 1.054.025c nāśayāmy adya gādheyaṃ nīhāram iva bhāskaraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2879: 1.054.026a evam uktvā mahātejā vasiṣṭho japatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2880: 1.054.026c viśvāmitraṃ tadā vākyaṃ saroṣam idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:2882: 1.054.027c durācāro 'si yan mūḍha tasmāt tvaṃ na bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_01_u:2883: 1.054.028a ity uktvā paramakruddho daṇḍam udyamya satvaraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2886: 1.055.001c āgneyam astram utkṣipya tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE09ram_01_u:2887: 1.055.002a vasiṣṭho bhagavān krodhād idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:2888: 1.055.003a kṣatrabandho sthito 'smy eṣa yad balaṃ tad vidarśaya
GE09ram_01_u:2889: 1.055.003c nāśayāmy eṣa te darpaṃ śastrasya tava gādhija
GE09ram_01_u:2890: 1.055.004a kva ca te kṣatriyabalaṃ kva ca brahmabalaṃ mahat
GE09ram_01_u:2893: 1.055.005c brahmadaṇḍena tac chāntam agner vega ivāmbhasā
GE09ram_01_u:2894: 1.055.006a vāruṇaṃ caiva raudraṃ ca aindraṃ pāśupataṃ tathā
GE09ram_01_u:2896: 1.055.007a mānavaṃ mohanaṃ caiva gāndharvaṃ svāpanaṃ tathā
GE09ram_01_u:2898: 1.055.008a śoṣaṇaṃ dāraṇaṃ caiva vajram astraṃ sudurjayam
GE09ram_01_u:2899: 1.055.008c brahmapāśaṃ kālapāśaṃ vāruṇaṃ pāśam eva ca
GE09ram_01_u:2900: 1.055.009a pinākāstraṃ ca dayitaṃ śuṣkārdre aśanī tathā
GE09ram_01_u:2901: 1.055.009c daṇḍāstram atha paiśācaṃ krauñcam astraṃ tathāiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:2903: 1.055.010c vāyavyaṃ mathanaṃ caiva astraṃ hayaśiras tathā
GE09ram_01_u:2904: 1.055.011a śaktidvayaṃ ca cikṣepa kaṅkālaṃ musalaṃ tathā
GE09ram_01_u:2905: 1.055.011c vaidyādharaṃ mahāstraṃ ca kālāstram atha dāruṇam
GE09ram_01_u:2906: 1.055.012a triśūlam astraṃ ghoraṃ ca kāpālam atha kaṅkaṇam
GE09ram_01_u:2908: 1.055.013a vasiṣṭhe japatāṃ śreṣṭhe tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE09ram_01_u:2909: 1.055.013c tāni sarvāṇi daṇḍena grasate brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2911: 1.055.014c tad astram udyataṃ dṛṣṭvā devāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2914: 1.055.016a tad apy astraṃ mahāghoraṃ brāhmaṃ brāhmeṇa tejasā
GE09ram_01_u:2923: 1.055.020c amoghaṃ te balaṃ brahmaṃs tejo dhāraya tejasā
GE09ram_01_u:2925: 1.055.021c prasīda japatāṃ śreṣṭha lokāḥ santu gatavyathāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2926: 1.055.022a evam ukto mahātejāḥ śamaṃ cakre mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2931: 1.055.024c tapo mahat samāsthāsye yad vai brahmatvakārakam
GE09ram_01_u:2934: 1.056.002a sa dakṣiṇāṃ diśaṃ gatvā mahiṣyā saha rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:2942: 1.056.005c anena tapasā tvāṃ hi rājarṣir iti vidmahe
GE09ram_01_u:2943: 1.056.006a evam uktvā mahātejā jagāma saha daivataiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2945: 1.056.007a viśvāmitro 'pi tac chrutvā hriyā kiṃ cid avāṅmukhaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2947: 1.056.008a tapaś ca sumahat taptaṃ rājarṣir iti māṃ viduḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2948: 1.056.008c devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ sarve nāsti manye tapaḥphalam
GE09ram_01_u:2949: 1.056.009a evaṃ niścitya manasā bhūya eva mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2951: 1.056.010a etasminn eva kāle tu satyavādī jitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2953: 1.056.011a tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā yajeyam iti rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:2955: 1.056.012a sa vasiṣṭhaṃ samāhūya kathayām āsa cintitam
GE09ram_01_u:2956: 1.056.012c aśakyam iti cāpy ukto vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:2957: 1.056.013a pratyākhyāto vasiṣṭhena sa yayau dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_01_u:2958: 1.056.013c vasiṣṭhā dīrgha tapasas tapo yatra hi tepire
GE09ram_01_u:2961: 1.056.015a so 'bhigamya mahātmānaḥ sarvān eva guroḥ sutān
GE09ram_01_u:2968: 1.056.018a śirasā praṇato yāce brāhmaṇāṃs tapasi sthitān
GE09ram_01_u:2969: 1.056.018c te māṃ bhavantaḥ siddhyarthaṃ yājayantu samāhitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2972: 1.056.019c guruputrān ṛte sarvān nāhaṃ paśyāmi kāṃ cana
GE09ram_01_u:2973: 1.056.020a ikṣvākūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ purodhāḥ paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2974: 1.056.020c tasmād anantaraṃ sarve bhavanto daivataṃ mama
GE09ram_01_u:2979: 1.057.003a ikṣvākūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ purodhāḥ paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2981: 1.057.004a aśakyam iti covāca vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2982: 1.057.004c taṃ vayaṃ vai samāhartuṃ kratuṃ śaktāḥ kathaṃ tava
GE09ram_01_u:2983: 1.057.005a bāliśas tvaṃ naraśreṣṭha gamyatāṃ svapuraṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2986: 1.057.006c sa rājā punar evaitān idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:2988: 1.057.007c anyāṃ gatiṃ gamiṣyāmi svasti vo 'stu tapodhanāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2989: 1.057.008a ṛṣiputrās tu tac chrutvā vākyaṃ ghorābhisaṃhitam
GE09ram_01_u:2991: 1.057.008e evam uktvā mahātmāno viviśus te svam āśramam
GE09ram_01_u:2992: 1.057.009a atha rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ rājā caṇḍālatāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2995: 1.057.010a taṃ dṛṣṭvā mantriṇaḥ sarve tyaktvā caṇḍālarūpiṇam
GE09ram_01_u:2997: 1.057.011a eko hi rājā kākutstha jagāma paramātmavān
GE09ram_01_u:2999: 1.057.012a viśvāmitras tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā rājānaṃ viphalīkṛtam
GE09ram_01_u:3001: 1.057.013a kāruṇyāt sa mahātejā vākyaṃ parama dhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3002: 1.057.013c idaṃ jagāda bhadraṃ te rājānaṃ ghoradarśanam
GE09ram_01_u:3005: 1.057.015a atha tad vākyam ākarṇya rājā caṇḍālatāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3008: 1.057.016c anavāpyaiva taṃ kāmaṃ mayā prāpto viparyayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3009: 1.057.017a saśarīro divaṃ yāyām iti me saumyadarśanam
GE09ram_01_u:3010: 1.057.017c mayā ceṣṭaṃ kratuśataṃ tac ca nāvāpyate phalam
GE09ram_01_u:3011: 1.057.018a anṛtaṃ nokta pūrvaṃ me na ca vakṣye kadā cana
GE09ram_01_u:3012: 1.057.018c kṛcchreṣv api gataḥ saumya kṣatradharmeṇa te śape
GE09ram_01_u:3013: 1.057.019a yajñair bahuvidhair iṣṭaṃ prajā dharmeṇa pālitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3017: 1.057.021a daivam eva paraṃ manye pauruṣaṃ tu nirarthakam
GE09ram_01_u:3018: 1.057.021c daivenākramyate sarvaṃ daivaṃ hi paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3021: 1.057.023a nānyāṃ gatiṃ gamiṣyāmi nānyaḥ śaraṇam asti me
GE09ram_01_u:3025: 1.058.002a ikṣvāko svāgataṃ vatsa jānāmi tvāṃ sudhārmikam
GE09ram_01_u:3026: 1.058.002c śaraṇaṃ te bhaviṣyāmi mā bhaiṣīr nṛpapuṃgava
GE09ram_01_u:3029: 1.058.004a guruśāpakṛtaṃ rūpaṃ yad idaṃ tvayi vartate
GE09ram_01_u:3031: 1.058.005a hastaprāptam ahaṃ manye svargaṃ tava nareśvara
GE09ram_01_u:3032: 1.058.005c yas tvaṃ kauśikam āgamya śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3035: 1.058.007a sarvāñ śiṣyān samāhūya vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:3040: 1.058.010a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā diśo jagmus tadājñayā
GE09ram_01_u:3042: 1.058.011a te ca śiṣyāḥ samāgamya muniṃ jvalitatejasaṃ
GE09ram_01_u:3043: 1.058.011c ūcuś ca vacanaṃ sarve sarveṣāṃ brahmavādinām
GE09ram_01_u:3044: 1.058.012a śrutvā te vacanaṃ sarve samāyānti dvijātayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3047: 1.058.013c yad āha vacanaṃ sarvaṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ munipuṃgava
GE09ram_01_u:3049: 1.058.014c kathaṃ sadasi bhoktāro havis tasya surarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3056: 1.058.018a yad dūṣayanty aduṣṭaṃ māṃ tapa ugraṃ samāsthitam
GE09ram_01_u:3061: 1.058.020c vikṛtāś ca virūpāś ca lokān anucarantv imān
GE09ram_01_u:3062: 1.058.021a mahodayaś ca durbuddhir mām adūṣyaṃ hy adūṣayat
GE09ram_01_u:3071: 1.059.002c dharmiṣṭhaś ca vadānyaś ca māṃ caiva śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3074: 1.059.003c tathā pravartyatāṃ yajño bhavadbhiś ca mayā saha
GE09ram_01_u:3078: 1.059.005c yad āha vacanaṃ samyag etat kāryaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3079: 1.059.006a agnikalpo hi bhagavāñ śāpaṃ dāsyati roṣitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3080: 1.059.006c tasmāt pravartyatāṃ yajñaḥ saśarīro yathā divam
GE09ram_01_u:3083: 1.059.008a evam uktvā maharṣayaḥ saṃjahrus tāḥ kriyās tadā
GE09ram_01_u:3091: 1.059.012a sruvam udyamya sakrodhas triśaṅkum idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:3092: 1.059.012c paśya me tapaso vīryaṃ svārjitasya nareśvara
GE09ram_01_u:3093: 1.059.013a eṣa tvāṃ svaśarīreṇa nayāmi svargam ojasā
GE09ram_01_u:3095: 1.059.014a svārjitaṃ kiṃ cid apy asti mayā hi tapasaḥ phalam
GE09ram_01_u:3096: 1.059.014c rājaṃs tvaṃ tejasā tasya saśarīro divaṃ vraja
GE09ram_01_u:3098: 1.059.015c divaṃ jagāma kākutstha munīnāṃ paśyatāṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:3100: 1.059.016c saha sarvaiḥ suragaṇair idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:3101: 1.059.017a triśaṅko gaccha bhūyas tvaṃ nāsi svargakṛtālayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3103: 1.059.018a evam ukto mahendreṇa triśaṅkur apatat punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3105: 1.059.019a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya krośamānasya kauśikaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3106: 1.059.019c roṣam āhārayat tīvraṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE09ram_01_u:3112: 1.059.022c anyam indraṃ kariṣyāmi loko vā syād anindrakaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3113: 1.059.022e daivatāny api sa krodhāt sraṣṭuṃ samupacakrame
GE09ram_01_u:3117: 1.059.024c saśarīro divaṃ yātuṃ nārhaty eva tapodhana
GE09ram_01_u:3120: 1.059.026a saśarīrasya bhadraṃ vas triśaṅkor asya bhūpateḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3123: 1.059.027c nakṣatrāṇi ca sarvāṇi māmakāni dhruvāṇy atha
GE09ram_01_u:3124: 1.059.028a yāval lokā dhariṣyanti tiṣṭhantv etāni sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3125: 1.059.028c matkṛtāni surāḥ sarve tad anujñātum arhatha
GE09ram_01_u:3126: 1.059.029a evam uktāḥ surāḥ sarve pratyūcur munipuṃgavam
GE09ram_01_u:3127: 1.059.030a evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ te tiṣṭhantv etāni sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3132: 1.059.032c ṛṣibhiś ca mahātejā bāḍham ity āha devatāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3133: 1.059.033a tato devā mahātmāno munayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3135: 1.060.001a viśvāmitro mahātmātha prasthitān prekṣya tān ṛṣīn
GE09ram_01_u:3138: 1.060.002c diśam anyāṃ prapatsyāmas tatra tapsyāmahe tapaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3140: 1.060.003c sukhaṃ tapaś cariṣyāmaḥ paraṃ tad dhi tapovanam
GE09ram_01_u:3143: 1.060.005a etasminn eva kāle tu ayodhyādhipatir nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3145: 1.060.006a tasya vai yajamānasya paśum indro jahāra ha
GE09ram_01_u:3146: 1.060.006c pranaṣṭe tu paśau vipro rājānam idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:3147: 1.060.007a paśur adya hṛto rājan pranaṣṭas tava durnayāt
GE09ram_01_u:3149: 1.060.008a prāyaścittaṃ mahad dhy etan naraṃ vā puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_01_u:3150: 1.060.008c ānayasva paśuṃ śīghraṃ yāvat karma pravartate
GE09ram_01_u:3151: 1.060.009a upādhyāya vacaḥ śrutvā sa rājā puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_01_u:3153: 1.060.010a deśāñ janapadāṃs tāṃs tān nagarāṇi vanāni ca
GE09ram_01_u:3159: 1.060.012e pṛṣṭvā sarvatra kuśalam ṛcīkaṃ tam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3162: 1.060.014a sarve parisṛtā deśā yajñiyaṃ na labhe paśum
GE09ram_01_u:3163: 1.060.014c dātum arhasi mūlyena sutam ekam ito mama
GE09ram_01_u:3164: 1.060.015a evam ukto mahātejā ṛcīkas tv abravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3165: 1.060.015c nāhaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ naraśreṣṭhaṃ vikrīṇīyāṃ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_01_u:3166: 1.060.016a ṛcīkasya vacaḥ śrutvā teṣāṃ mātā mahātmanām
GE09ram_01_u:3168: 1.060.017a mamāpi dayitaṃ viddhi kaniṣṭhaṃ śunakaṃ nṛpa
GE09ram_01_u:3169: 1.060.018a prāyeṇa hi naraśreṣṭha jyeṣṭhāḥ pitṛṣu vallabhāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3170: 1.060.018c mātḥṇāṃ ca kanīyāṃsas tasmād rakṣe kanīyasaṃ
GE09ram_01_u:3171: 1.060.019a uktavākye munau tasmin munipatnyāṃ tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:3172: 1.060.019c śunaḥśepaḥ svayaṃ rāma madhyamo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:3173: 1.060.020a pitā jyeṣṭham avikreyaṃ mātā cāha kanīyasaṃ
GE09ram_01_u:3174: 1.060.020c vikrītaṃ madhyamaṃ manye rājan putraṃ nayasva mām
GE09ram_01_u:3177: 1.060.022a ambarīṣas tu rājarṣī ratham āropya satvaraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3182: 1.061.002c puṣkaraṃ śreṣṭham āgamya viśvāmitraṃ dadarśa ha
GE09ram_01_u:3183: 1.061.003a viṣaṇṇavadano dīnas tṛṣṇayā ca śrameṇa ca
GE09ram_01_u:3184: 1.061.003c papātāṅke mune rāma vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:3185: 1.061.004a na me 'sti mātā na pitā jñātayo bāndhavāḥ kutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3186: 1.061.004c trātum arhasi māṃ saumya dharmeṇa munipuṃgava
GE09ram_01_u:3187: 1.061.005a trātā tvaṃ hi muniśreṣṭha sarveṣāṃ tvaṃ hi bhāvanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3188: 1.061.005c rājā ca kṛtakāryaḥ syād ahaṃ dīrghāyur avyayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3189: 1.061.006a svargalokam upāśnīyāṃ tapas taptvā hy anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:3190: 1.061.006c sa me nātho hy anāthasya bhava bhavyena cetasā
GE09ram_01_u:3191: 1.061.006e piteva putraṃ dharmātmaṃs trātum arhasi kilbiṣāt
GE09ram_01_u:3193: 1.061.007c sāntvayitvā bahuvidhaṃ putrān idam uvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:3196: 1.061.009a ayaṃ munisuto bālo mattaḥ śaraṇam icchati
GE09ram_01_u:3200: 1.061.011a nāthavāṃś ca śunaḥśepo yajñaś cāvighnato bhavet
GE09ram_01_u:3201: 1.061.011c devatās tarpitāś ca syur mama cāpi kṛtaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3202: 1.061.012a munes tu vacanaṃ śrutvā madhuṣyandādayaḥ sutāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3205: 1.061.013c akāryam iva paśyāmaḥ śvamāṃsam iva bhojane
GE09ram_01_u:3206: 1.061.014a teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā putrāṇāṃ munipuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3208: 1.061.015a niḥsādhvasam idaṃ proktaṃ dharmād api vigarhitam
GE09ram_01_u:3215: 1.061.018c vaiṣṇavaṃ yūpam āsādya vāgbhir agnim udāhara
GE09ram_01_u:3216: 1.061.019a ime tu gāthe dve divye gāyethā muniputraka
GE09ram_01_u:3218: 1.061.020a śunaḥśepo gṛhītvā te dve gāthe susamāhitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3219: 1.061.020c tvarayā rājasiṃhaṃ tam ambarīṣam uvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:3222: 1.061.022a tad vākyam ṛṣiputrasya śrutvā harṣaṃ samutsukaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3225: 1.061.023c paśuṃ raktāmbaraṃ kṛtvā yūpe taṃ samabandhayat
GE09ram_01_u:3226: 1.061.024a sa baddho vāgbhir agryābhir abhituṣṭāva vai surau
GE09ram_01_u:3229: 1.061.025c dīrgham āyus tadā prādāc chunaḥśepāya rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:3230: 1.061.026a sa ca rājā naraśreṣṭha yajñasya ca samāptavān
GE09ram_01_u:3237: 1.062.002c ṛṣis tvam asi bhadraṃ te svārjitaiḥ karmabhiḥ śubhaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3238: 1.062.003a tam evam uktvā deveśas tridivaṃ punar abhyagāt
GE09ram_01_u:3239: 1.062.003c viśvāmitro mahātejā bhūyas tepe mahat tapaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3244: 1.062.006a dṛṣṭvā kandarpavaśago munis tām idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:3245: 1.062.006c apsaraḥ svāgataṃ te 'stu vasa ceha mamāśrame
GE09ram_01_u:3247: 1.062.007a ity uktā sā varārohā tatrāvāsam athākarot
GE09ram_01_u:3249: 1.062.008a tasyāṃ vasantyāṃ varṣāṇi pañca pañca ca rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:3251: 1.062.009a atha kāle gate tasmin viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3258: 1.062.013a bhītām apsarasaṃ dṛṣṭvā vepantīṃ prāñjaliṃ sthitām
GE09ram_01_u:3260: 1.062.013e uttaraṃ parvataṃ rāma viśvāmitro jagāma ha
GE09ram_01_u:3261: 1.062.014a sa kṛtvā naiṣṭhikīṃ buddhiṃ jetukāmo mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3263: 1.062.015a tasya varṣasahasraṃ tu ghoraṃ tapa upāsataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3264: 1.062.015c uttare parvate rāma devatānām abhūd bhayam
GE09ram_01_u:3271: 1.062.019a brahmaṇaḥ sa vacaḥ śrutvā viśvāmitras tapodhanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3273: 1.062.020a brahmarṣi śabdam atulaṃ svārjitaiḥ karmabhiḥ śubhaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3274: 1.062.020c yadi me bhagavān āha tato 'haṃ vijitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3275: 1.062.021a tam uvāca tato brahmā na tāvat tvaṃ jitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3276: 1.062.021c yatasva muniśārdūla ity uktvā tridivaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3281: 1.062.024a evaṃ varṣasahasraṃ hi tapo ghoram upāgamat
GE09ram_01_u:3283: 1.062.025a saṃbhramaḥ sumahān āsīt surāṇāṃ vāsavasya ca
GE09ram_01_u:3284: 1.062.025c rambhām apsarasaṃ śakraḥ saha sarvair marudgaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3286: 1.063.001a surakāryam idaṃ rambhe kartavyaṃ sumahat tvayā
GE09ram_01_u:3291: 1.063.003c krodham utsrakṣyate ghoraṃ mayi deva na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3292: 1.063.003e tato hi me bhayaṃ deva prasādaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:3294: 1.063.004c mā bhaiṣi rambhe bhadraṃ te kuruṣva mama śāsanam
GE09ram_01_u:3297: 1.063.006a tvaṃ hi rūpaṃ bahuguṇaṃ kṛtvā paramabhāsvaram
GE09ram_01_u:3298: 1.063.006c tam ṛṣiṃ kauśikaṃ rambhe bhedayasva tapasvinam
GE09ram_01_u:3299: 1.063.007a sā śrutvā vacanaṃ tasya kṛtvā rūpam anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:3301: 1.063.008a kokilasya tu śuśrāva valgu vyāharataḥ svanam
GE09ram_01_u:3303: 1.063.009a atha tasya ca śabdena gītenāpratimena ca
GE09ram_01_u:3304: 1.063.009c darśanena ca rambhāyā muniḥ saṃdeham āgataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3313: 1.063.014a tasya śāpena mahatā rambhā śailī tadābhavat
GE09ram_01_u:3314: 1.063.014c vacaḥ śrutvā ca kandarpo maharṣeḥ sa ca nirgataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3316: 1.063.015c indriyair ajitai rāma na lebhe śāntim ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3317: 1.064.001a atha haimavatīṃ rāma diśaṃ tyaktvā mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3318: 1.064.001c pūrvāṃ diśam anuprāpya tapas tepe sudāruṇam
GE09ram_01_u:3322: 1.064.003c vighnair bahubhir ādhūtaṃ krodho nāntaram āviśat
GE09ram_01_u:3328: 1.064.006a na hy asya vṛjinaṃ kiṃ cid dṛśyate sūkṣmam apy atha
GE09ram_01_u:3329: 1.064.006c na dīyate yadi tv asya manasā yad abhīpsitam
GE09ram_01_u:3331: 1.064.006g vyākulāś ca diśaḥ sarvā na ca kiṃ cit prakāśate
GE09ram_01_u:3332: 1.064.007a sāgarāḥ kṣubhitāḥ sarve viśīryante ca parvatāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3333: 1.064.007c prakampate ca pṛthivī vāyur vāti bhṛśākulaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3334: 1.064.008a buddhiṃ na kurute yāvan nāśe deva mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3337: 1.064.009c devarājye cikīrṣeta dīyatām asya yan matam
GE09ram_01_u:3340: 1.064.011a brahmarṣe svāgataṃ te 'stu tapasā sma sutoṣitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3342: 1.064.012a dīrgham āyuś ca te brahman dadāmi samarudgaṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3343: 1.064.012c svasti prāpnuhi bhadraṃ te gaccha saumya yathāsukham
GE09ram_01_u:3346: 1.064.014a brāhmaṇyaṃ yadi me prāptaṃ dīrgham āyus tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:3347: 1.064.014c oṃkāro 'tha vaṣaṭkāro vedāś ca varayantu mām
GE09ram_01_u:3349: 1.064.015c brahmaputro vasiṣṭho mām evaṃ vadatu devatāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3350: 1.064.015e yady ayaṃ paramaḥ kāmaḥ kṛto yāntu surarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3351: 1.064.016a tataḥ prasādito devair vasiṣṭho japatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3352: 1.064.016c sakhyaṃ cakāra brahmarṣir evam astv iti cābravīt
GE09ram_01_u:3353: 1.064.017a brahmarṣitvaṃ na saṃdehaḥ sarvaṃ saṃpatsyate tava
GE09ram_01_u:3354: 1.064.017c ity uktvā devatāś cāpi sarvā jagmur yathāgatam
GE09ram_01_u:3356: 1.064.018c pūjayām āsa brahmarṣiṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ japatāṃ varam
GE09ram_01_u:3357: 1.064.019a kṛtakāmo mahīṃ sarvāṃ cacāra tapasi sthitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3358: 1.064.019c evaṃ tv anena brāhmaṇyaṃ prāptaṃ rāma mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:3359: 1.064.020a eṣa rāma muniśreṣṭha eṣa vigrahavāṃs tapaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3360: 1.064.020c eṣa dharmaḥ paro nityaṃ vīryasyaiṣa parāyaṇam
GE09ram_01_u:3364: 1.064.022c yajñaṃ kākutstha sahitaḥ prāptavān asi dhārmika
GE09ram_01_u:3366: 1.064.023c guṇā bahuvidhāḥ prāptās tava saṃdarśanān mayā
GE09ram_01_u:3367: 1.064.024a vistareṇa ca te brahman kīrtyamānaṃ mahat tapaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3368: 1.064.024c śrutaṃ mayā mahātejo rāmeṇa ca mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:3369: 1.064.025a sadasyaiḥ prāpya ca sadaḥ śrutās te bahavo guṇāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3370: 1.064.026a aprameyaṃ tapas tubhyam aprameyaṃ ca te balam
GE09ram_01_u:3371: 1.064.026c aprameyā guṇāś caiva nityaṃ te kuśikātmaja
GE09ram_01_u:3372: 1.064.027a tṛptir āścaryabhūtānāṃ kathānāṃ nāsti me vibho
GE09ram_01_u:3374: 1.064.028a śvaḥ prabhāte mahātejo draṣṭum arhasi māṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3375: 1.064.028c svāgataṃ tapasāṃ śreṣṭha mām anujñātum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:3383: 1.065.002c rāghavau ca mahātmānau tadā vākyam uvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:3384: 1.065.003a bhagavan svāgataṃ te 'stu kiṃ karomi tavānagha
GE09ram_01_u:3385: 1.065.003c bhavān ājñāpayatu mām ājñāpyo bhavatā hy aham
GE09ram_01_u:3386: 1.065.004a evam uktaḥ sa dharmātmā janakena mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:3389: 1.065.005c draṣṭukāmau dhanuḥ śreṣṭhaṃ yad etat tvayi tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_01_u:3390: 1.065.006a etad darśaya bhadraṃ te kṛtakāmau nṛpātmajau
GE09ram_01_u:3392: 1.065.007a evam uktas tu janakaḥ pratyuvāca mahāmunim
GE09ram_01_u:3393: 1.065.007c śrūyatām asya dhanuṣo yad artham iha tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_01_u:3394: 1.065.008a devarāta iti khyāto nimeḥ ṣaṣṭho mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3395: 1.065.008c nyāso 'yaṃ tasya bhagavan haste datto mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:3397: 1.065.009c rudras tu tridaśān roṣāt salilam idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:3398: 1.065.010a yasmād bhāgārthino bhāgān nākalpayata me surāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3400: 1.065.011a tato vimanasaḥ sarve devā vai munipuṃgava
GE09ram_01_u:3402: 1.065.012a prītiyuktaḥ sa sarveṣāṃ dadau teṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_01_u:3404: 1.065.013c nyāsabhūtaṃ tadā nyastam asmākaṃ pūrvake vibho
GE09ram_01_u:3405: 1.065.014a atha me kṛṣataḥ kṣetraṃ lāṅgalād utthitā mama
GE09ram_01_u:3406: 1.065.014c kṣetraṃ śodhayatā labdhvā nāmnā sīteti viśrutā
GE09ram_01_u:3407: 1.065.015a bhūtalād utthitā sā tu vyavardhata mamātmajā
GE09ram_01_u:3409: 1.065.016a bhūtalād utthitāṃ tāṃ tu vardhamānāṃ mamātmajām
GE09ram_01_u:3412: 1.065.017c vīryaśulketi bhagavan na dadāmi sutām aham
GE09ram_01_u:3416: 1.065.019c na śekur grahaṇe tasya dhanuṣas tolane 'pi vā
GE09ram_01_u:3417: 1.065.020a teṣāṃ vīryavatāṃ vīryam alpaṃ jñātvā mahāmune
GE09ram_01_u:3423: 1.065.023a tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe kṣayaṃ yātāni sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3427: 1.065.025a tato bhagnā nṛpatayo hanyamānā diśo yayuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3431: 1.065.027a yady asya dhanuṣo rāmaḥ kuryād āropaṇaṃ mune
GE09ram_01_u:3432: 1.065.027c sutām ayonijāṃ sītāṃ dadyāṃ dāśarather aham
GE09ram_01_u:3434: 1.066.001c dhanur darśaya rāmāya iti hovāca pārthivam
GE09ram_01_u:3435: 1.066.002a tataḥ sa rājā janakaḥ sacivān vyādideśa ha
GE09ram_01_u:3438: 1.066.003c tad dhanuḥ purataḥ kṛtvā nirjagmuḥ pārthivājñayā
GE09ram_01_u:3440: 1.066.004c mañjūṣām aṣṭacakrāṃ tāṃ samūhas te kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_01_u:3441: 1.066.005a tām ādāya tu mañjūṣām āyatīṃ yatra tad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3442: 1.066.005c suropamaṃ te janakam ūcur nṛpati mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3445: 1.066.007a teṣāṃ nṛpo vacaḥ śrutvā kṛtāñjalir abhāṣata
GE09ram_01_u:3448: 1.066.008c rājabhiś ca mahāvīryair aśakyaṃ pūrituṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:3449: 1.066.009a naitat suragaṇāḥ sarve nāsurā na ca rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3451: 1.066.010a kva gatir mānuṣāṇāṃ ca dhanuṣo 'sya prapūraṇe
GE09ram_01_u:3453: 1.066.011a tad etad dhanuṣāṃ śreṣṭham ānītaṃ munipuṃgava
GE09ram_01_u:3456: 1.066.012c vatsa rāma dhanuḥ paśya iti rāghavam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:3457: 1.066.013a maharṣer vacanād rāmo yatra tiṣṭhati tad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3458: 1.066.013c mañjūṣāṃ tām apāvṛtya dṛṣṭvā dhanur athābravīt
GE09ram_01_u:3460: 1.066.014c yatnavāṃś ca bhaviṣyāmi tolane pūraṇe 'pi vā
GE09ram_01_u:3461: 1.066.015a bāḍham ity eva taṃ rājā muniś ca samabhāṣata
GE09ram_01_u:3462: 1.066.015c līlayā sa dhanur madhye jagrāha vacanān muneḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3464: 1.066.016c āropayat sa dharmātmā salīlam iva tad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3465: 1.066.017a āropayitvā maurvīṃ ca pūrayām āsa vīryavān
GE09ram_01_u:3466: 1.066.017c tad babhañja dhanur madhye naraśreṣṭho mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3469: 1.066.019a nipetuś ca narāḥ sarve tena śabdena mohitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3470: 1.066.019c vrajayitvā munivaraṃ rājānaṃ tau ca rāghavau
GE09ram_01_u:3474: 1.066.021c atyadbhutam acintyaṃ ca atarkitam idaṃ mayā
GE09ram_01_u:3475: 1.066.022a janakānāṃ kule kīrtim āhariṣyati me sutā
GE09ram_01_u:3477: 1.066.023a mama satyā pratijñā ca vīryaśulketi kauśika
GE09ram_01_u:3478: 1.066.023c sītā prāṇair bahumatā deyā rāmāya me sutā
GE09ram_01_u:3480: 1.066.024c mama kauśika bhadraṃ te ayodhyāṃ tvaritā rathaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3481: 1.066.025a rājānaṃ praśritair vākyair ānayantu puraṃ mama
GE09ram_01_u:3483: 1.066.026a muniguptau ca kākutsthau kathayantu nṛpāya vai
GE09ram_01_u:3485: 1.066.027a kauśikaś ca tathety āha rājā cābhāṣya mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3488: 1.067.001c trirātram uṣitvā mārge te 'yodhyāṃ prāviśan purīm
GE09ram_01_u:3501: 1.067.008a seyaṃ mama sutā rājan viśvāmitra puraḥsaraiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3503: 1.067.009a tac ca rājan dhanur divyaṃ madhye bhagnaṃ mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:3505: 1.067.010a asmai deyā mayā sītā vīryaśulkā mahātmane
GE09ram_01_u:3506: 1.067.010c pratijñāṃ tartum icchāmi tad anujñātum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:3508: 1.067.011c śīghram āgaccha bhadraṃ te draṣṭum arhasi rāghavau
GE09ram_01_u:3509: 1.067.012a prītiṃ ca mama rājendra nirvartayitum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:3510: 1.067.012c putrayor ubhayor eva prītiṃ tvam api lapsyase
GE09ram_01_u:3513: 1.067.014a dūtavākyaṃ tu tac chrutvā rājā paramaharṣitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3514: 1.067.014c vasiṣṭhaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca mantriṇo 'nyāṃś ca so 'bravīt
GE09ram_01_u:3516: 1.067.015c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā videheṣu vasaty asau
GE09ram_01_u:3518: 1.067.016c saṃpradānaṃ sutāyās tu rāghave kartum icchati
GE09ram_01_u:3519: 1.067.017a yadi vo rocate vṛttaṃ janakasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3520: 1.067.017c purīṃ gacchāmahe śīghraṃ mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3521: 1.067.018a mantriṇo bāḍham ity āhuḥ saha sarvair maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3522: 1.067.018c suprītaś cābravīd rājā śvo yātreti sa mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3524: 1.067.019c ūṣuḥ pramuditāḥ sarve guṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ samanvitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3526: 1.068.001c rājā daśaratho hṛṣṭaḥ sumantram idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:3527: 1.068.002a adya sarve dhanādhyakṣā dhanam ādāya puṣkalam
GE09ram_01_u:3531: 1.068.004a vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābālir atha kāśyapaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3532: 1.068.004c mārkaṇḍeyaś ca dīrghāyur ṛṣiḥ kātyāyanas tathā
GE09ram_01_u:3533: 1.068.005a ete dvijāḥ prayāntv agre syandanaṃ yojayasva me
GE09ram_01_u:3534: 1.068.005c yathā kālātyayo na syād dūtā hi tvarayanti mām
GE09ram_01_u:3535: 1.068.006a vacanāc ca narendrasya sā senā caturaṅgiṇī
GE09ram_01_u:3538: 1.068.007c rājā tu janakaḥ śrīmāñ śrutvā pūjām akalpayat
GE09ram_01_u:3539: 1.068.008a tato rājānam āsādya vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_01_u:3540: 1.068.008c janako mudito rājā harṣaṃ ca paramaṃ yayau
GE09ram_01_u:3542: 1.068.009a svāgataṃ te mahārāja diṣṭyā prāpto 'si rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:3544: 1.068.010a diṣṭyā prāpto mahātejā vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3545: 1.068.010c saha sarvair dvijaśreṣṭhair devair iva śatakratuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3546: 1.068.011a diṣṭyā me nirjitā vighnā diṣṭyā me pūjitaṃ kulam
GE09ram_01_u:3552: 1.068.014a pratigraho dātṛvaśaḥ śrutam etan mayā purā
GE09ram_01_u:3553: 1.068.014c yathā vakṣyasi dharmajña tat kariṣyāmahe vayam
GE09ram_01_u:3554: 1.068.015a tad dharmiṣṭhaṃ yaśasyaṃ ca vacanaṃ satyavādinaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3557: 1.068.016c harṣeṇa mahatā yuktās tāṃ niśām avasan sukham
GE09ram_01_u:3558: 1.068.017a rājā ca rāghavau putrau niśāmya pariharṣitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3561: 1.068.018c yajñasya ca sutābhyāṃ ca kṛtvā rātrim uvāsa ha
GE09ram_01_u:3565: 1.069.002c kuśadhvaja iti khyātaḥ purīm adhyavasac chubhām
GE09ram_01_u:3568: 1.069.004a tam ahaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi yajñagoptā sa me mataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3569: 1.069.004c prītiṃ so 'pi mahātejā iṃmāṃ bhoktā mayā saha
GE09ram_01_u:3576: 1.069.008c upaviṣṭāv ubhau tau tu bhrātarāv amitaujasau
GE09ram_01_u:3580: 1.069.010a aupakāryāṃ sa gatvā tu raghūṇāṃ kulavardhanam
GE09ram_01_u:3585: 1.069.012c sabandhur agamat tatra janako yatra vartate
GE09ram_01_u:3587: 1.069.013c vākyaṃ vākyavidāṃ śreṣṭho vaideham idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:3589: 1.069.014c vaktā sarveṣu kṛtyeṣu vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3591: 1.069.015c eṣa vakṣyati dharmātmā vasiṣṭho me yathākramam
GE09ram_01_u:3595: 1.069.017c tasmān marīciḥ saṃjajñe marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3596: 1.069.018a vivasvān kaśyapāj jajñe manur vaivaivataḥ smṛtaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3597: 1.069.018c manuḥ prajāpatiḥ pūrvam ikṣvākus tu manoḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3598: 1.069.019a tam ikṣvākum ayodhyāyāṃ rājānaṃ viddhi pūrvakam
GE09ram_01_u:3599: 1.069.019c ikṣvākos tu sutaḥ śrīmān vikukṣir udapadyata
GE09ram_01_u:3600: 1.069.020a vikukṣes tu mahātejā bāṇaḥ putraḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_01_u:3602: 1.069.021a anaraṇyāt pṛthur jajñe triśaṅkus tu pṛthoḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3606: 1.069.023a māndhātus tu sutaḥ śrīmān susaṃdhir udapadyata
GE09ram_01_u:3607: 1.069.023c susaṃdher api putrau dvau dhruvasaṃdhiḥ prasenajit
GE09ram_01_u:3608: 1.069.024a yaśasvī dhruvasaṃdhes tu bharato nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3609: 1.069.024c bharatāt tu mahātejā asito nāma jāyata
GE09ram_01_u:3610: 1.069.025a saha tena gareṇaiva jātaḥ sa sagaro 'bhavat
GE09ram_01_u:3613: 1.069.026c bhagīrathāt kakutsthaś ca kakutsthasya raghus tathā
GE09ram_01_u:3614: 1.069.027a raghos tu putras tejasvī pravṛddhaḥ puruṣādakaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3615: 1.069.027c kalmāṣapādo hy abhavat tasmāj jātas tu śaṅkhaṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3617: 1.069.028c śīghragas tv agnivarṇasya śīghragasya maruḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3618: 1.069.029a maroḥ praśuśrukas tv āsīd ambarīṣaḥ praśuśrukāt
GE09ram_01_u:3620: 1.069.030a nahuṣasya yayātis tu nābhāgas tu yayātijaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3628: 1.070.001c śrotum arhasi bhadraṃ te kulaṃ naḥ kīrtitaṃ param
GE09ram_01_u:3631: 1.070.003a rājābhūt triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ svena karmaṇā
GE09ram_01_u:3633: 1.070.004a tasya putro mithir nāma janako mithi putrakaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3634: 1.070.004c prathamo janako nāma janakād apy udāvasuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3635: 1.070.005a udāvasos tu dharmātmā jāto vai nandivardhanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3636: 1.070.005c nandivardhana putras tu suketur nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3642: 1.070.008c dhṛṣṭaketos tu rājarṣer haryaśva iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3643: 1.070.009a haryaśvasya maruḥ putro maroḥ putraḥ pratīndhakaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3652: 1.070.013c jyeṣṭho 'ham anujo bhrātā mama vīraḥ kuśadhvajaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3653: 1.070.014a māṃ tu jyeṣṭhaṃ pitā rājye so 'bhiṣicya narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3654: 1.070.014c kuśadhvajaṃ samāveśya bhāraṃ mayi vanaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3655: 1.070.015a vṛddhe pitari svaryāte dharmeṇa dhuram āvaham
GE09ram_01_u:3657: 1.070.016a kasya cit tv atha kālasya sāṃkāśyād agamat purāt
GE09ram_01_u:3659: 1.070.017a sa ca me preṣayām āsa śaivaṃ dhanur anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:3660: 1.070.017c sītā kanyā ca padmākṣī mahyaṃ vai dīyatām iti
GE09ram_01_u:3661: 1.070.018a tasyāpradānād brahmarṣe yuddham āsīn mayā saha
GE09ram_01_u:3662: 1.070.018c sa hato 'bhimukho rājā sudhanvā tu mayā raṇe
GE09ram_01_u:3665: 1.070.020a kanīyān eṣa me bhrātā ahaṃ jyeṣṭho mahāmune
GE09ram_01_u:3667: 1.070.021a sītāṃ rāmāya bhadraṃ te ūrmilāṃ lakṣmaṇāya ca
GE09ram_01_u:3669: 1.070.022a dvitīyām ūrmilāṃ caiva trir vadāmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3672: 1.070.023c pitṛkāryaṃ ca bhadraṃ te tato vaivāhikaṃ kuru
GE09ram_01_u:3673: 1.070.024a maghā hy adya mahābāho tṛtīye divase prabho
GE09ram_01_u:3674: 1.070.024c phalgunyām uttare rājaṃs tasmin vaivāhikaṃ kuru
GE09ram_01_u:3679: 1.071.002c ikṣvākūṇāṃ videhānāṃ naiṣāṃ tulyo 'sti kaś cana
GE09ram_01_u:3682: 1.071.004a vaktavyaṃ na naraśreṣṭha śrūyatāṃ vacanaṃ mama
GE09ram_01_u:3683: 1.071.005a bhrātā yavīyān dharmajña eṣa rājā kuśadhvajaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3687: 1.071.006c varayema sute rājaṃs tayor arthe mahātmanoḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3695: 1.071.010c evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ vaḥ kuśadhvajasute ime
GE09ram_01_u:3701: 1.071.013a evam uktvā vacaḥ saumyaṃ pratyutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3702: 1.071.013c ubhau munivarau rājā janako vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:3703: 1.071.014a paro dharmaḥ kṛto mahyaṃ śiṣyo 'smi bhavatoḥ sadā
GE09ram_01_u:3706: 1.071.015c prabhutve nāsit saṃdeho yathārhaṃ kartum arhathaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3711: 1.071.018a svasti prāpnuhi bhadraṃ te gamiṣyāmi svam ālayam
GE09ram_01_u:3713: 1.071.019a tam āpṛṣṭvā narapatiṃ rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:3715: 1.071.020a sa gatvā nilayaṃ rājā śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3716: 1.071.020c prabhāte kālyam utthāya cakre godānam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:3718: 1.071.021c ekaikaśo dadau rājā putrān uddhiśya dharmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3721: 1.071.023a vittam anyac ca subahu dvijebhyo raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3723: 1.071.024a sa sutaiḥ kṛtagodānair vṛtaś ca nṛpatis tadā
GE09ram_01_u:3725: 1.072.001a yasmiṃs tu divase rājā cakre godānam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:3726: 1.072.001c tasmiṃs tu divase śūro yudhājit samupeyivān
GE09ram_01_u:3728: 1.072.002c dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭvā ca kuśalaṃ rājānam idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:3733: 1.072.005a śrutvā tv ahaym ayodhyāyāṃ vivāhārthaṃ tāv ātmajān
GE09ram_01_u:3734: 1.072.005c mithilām upayātās tu tvayā saha mahīpate
GE09ram_01_u:3738: 1.072.007c tatas tām uṣito rātriṃ saha putrair mahātmabhiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3742: 1.072.009a vasiṣṭhaṃ purataḥ kṛtvā maharṣīn aparān api
GE09ram_01_u:3749: 1.072.013a kaḥ sthitaḥ pratihāro me kasyājñā saṃpratīkṣyate
GE09ram_01_u:3750: 1.072.013c svagṛhe ko vicāro 'sti yathā rājyam idaṃ tava
GE09ram_01_u:3752: 1.072.014c mama kanyā muniśreṣṭha dīptā vahner ivārciṣaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3754: 1.072.015c avighnaṃ kurutāṃ rājā kimarthaṃ hi vilambyate
GE09ram_01_u:3756: 1.072.016c praveśayām āsa sutān sarvān ṛṣigaṇān api
GE09ram_01_u:3758: 1.072.017c iyaṃ sītā mama sutā sahadharmacarī tava
GE09ram_01_u:3759: 1.072.017e pratīccha caināṃ bhadraṃ te pāṇiṃ gṛhṇīṣva pāṇinā
GE09ram_01_u:3760: 1.072.018a lakṣmaṇāgaccha bhadraṃ te ūrmilām udyatāṃ mayā
GE09ram_01_u:3761: 1.072.018c pratīccha pāṇiṃ gṛhṇīṣva mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3762: 1.072.019a tam evam uktvā janako bharataṃ cābhyabhāṣata
GE09ram_01_u:3766: 1.072.021a sarve bhavantaḥ saṃyāś ca sarve sucaritavratāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3767: 1.072.021c patnībhiḥ santu kākutsthā mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3768: 1.072.022a janakasya vacaḥ śrutvā pāṇīn pāṇibhir aspṛśan
GE09ram_01_u:3769: 1.072.022c catvāras te catasṛṇāṃ vasiṣṭhasya mate sthitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3770: 1.072.023a agniṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā vediṃ rājānam eva ca
GE09ram_01_u:3771: 1.072.023c ṛṣīṃś caiva mahātmānaḥ saha bhāryā raghūttamāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3775: 1.072.025a nanṛtuś cāpsaraḥsaṃghā gandharvāś ca jaguḥ kalam
GE09ram_01_u:3778: 1.072.026c trir agniṃ te parikramya ūhur bhāryā mahaujasaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3785: 1.073.003a atha rājā videhānāṃ dadau kanyādhanaṃ bahu
GE09ram_01_u:3789: 1.073.005a dadau kanyā pitā tāsāṃ dāsīdāsam anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:3797: 1.073.009a ghorāḥ sma pakṣiṇo vāco vyāharanti tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3798: 1.073.009c bhaumāś caiva mṛgāḥ sarve gacchanti sma pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_01_u:3800: 1.073.010c asaumyāḥ pakṣiṇo ghorā mṛgāś cāpi pradakṣiṇāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3801: 1.073.010e kim idaṃ hṛdayotkampi mano mama viṣīdati
GE09ram_01_u:3802: 1.073.011a rājño daśarathasyaitac chrutvā vākyaṃ mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3803: 1.073.011c uvāca madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ śrūyatām asya yat phalam
GE09ram_01_u:3804: 1.073.012a upasthitaṃ bhayaṃ ghoraṃ divyaṃ pakṣimukhāc cyutam
GE09ram_01_u:3805: 1.073.012c mṛgāḥ praśamayanty ete saṃtāpas tyajyatām ayam
GE09ram_01_u:3806: 1.073.013a teṣāṃ saṃvadatāṃ tatra vāyuḥ prādur babhūva ha
GE09ram_01_u:3807: 1.073.013c kampayan medinīṃ sarvāṃ pātayaṃś ca drumāṃḥ śubhān
GE09ram_01_u:3808: 1.073.014a tamasā saṃvṛtaḥ sūryaḥ sarvā na prababhur diśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3809: 1.073.014c bhasmanā cāvṛtaṃ sarvaṃ saṃmūḍham iva tad balam
GE09ram_01_u:3810: 1.073.015a vasiṣṭha ṛṣayaś cānye rājā ca sasutas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:3811: 1.073.015c sasaṃjñā iva tatrāsan sarvam anyad vicetanam
GE09ram_01_u:3812: 1.073.016a tasmiṃs tamasi ghore tu bhasmacchanneva sā camūḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3814: 1.073.017a kailāsam iva durdharṣaṃ kālāgnim iva duḥsaham
GE09ram_01_u:3817: 1.073.018c pragṛhya śaramukhyaṃ ca tripuraghnaṃ yathā haram
GE09ram_01_u:3818: 1.073.019a taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmasaṃkāśaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam
GE09ram_01_u:3820: 1.073.019e saṃgatā munayaḥ sarve saṃjajalpur atho mithaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3823: 1.073.020e kṣatrasyotsādanaṃ bhūyo na khalv asya cikīrṣitam
GE09ram_01_u:3825: 1.073.021c ṛṣayo rāma rāmeti madhurāṃ vācam abruvan
GE09ram_01_u:3826: 1.073.022a pratigṛhya tu tāṃ pūjām ṛṣidattāṃ pratāpavān
GE09ram_01_u:3828: 1.074.001a rāma dāśarathe vīra vīryaṃ te śrūyate 'dhutam
GE09ram_01_u:3829: 1.074.001c dhanuṣo bhedanaṃ caiva nikhilena mayā śrutam
GE09ram_01_u:3830: 1.074.002a tad adbhutam acintyaṃ ca bhedanaṃ dhanuṣas tvayā
GE09ram_01_u:3831: 1.074.002c tac chrutvāham anuprāpto dhanur gṛhyāparaṃ śubham
GE09ram_01_u:3832: 1.074.003a tad idaṃ ghorasaṃkāśaṃ jāmadagnyaṃ mahad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3834: 1.074.004a tad ahaṃ te balaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhanuṣo 'sya prapūraṇe
GE09ram_01_u:3836: 1.074.005a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājā daśarataḥs tadā
GE09ram_01_u:3839: 1.074.006c bālānāṃ mama putrāṇām abhayaṃ dātum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:3842: 1.074.008a sa tvaṃ dharmaparo bhūtvā kāśyapāya vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_01_u:3845: 1.074.009c na caikasmin hate rāme sarve jīvāmahe vayam
GE09ram_01_u:3848: 1.074.011a ime dve dhanuṣī śreṣṭhe divye lokābhiviśrute
GE09ram_01_u:3851: 1.074.012c tripuraghnaṃ naraśreṣṭha bhagnaṃ kākutsha yat tvayā
GE09ram_01_u:3852: 1.074.013a idaṃ dvitīyaṃ durdharṣaṃ viṣṇor dattaṃ surottamaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3853: 1.074.013c samānasāraṃ kākutstha raudreṇa dhanuṣā tv idam
GE09ram_01_u:3854: 1.074.014a tadā tu devatāḥ sarvāḥ pṛcchanti sma pitāmaham
GE09ram_01_u:3857: 1.074.015c virodhaṃ janayām āsa tayoḥ satyavatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3858: 1.074.016a virodhe ca mahad yuddham abhavad romaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_01_u:3860: 1.074.017a tadā taj jṛmbhitaṃ śaivaṃ dhanur bhīmaparākramam
GE09ram_01_u:3863: 1.074.018c yācitau praśamaṃ tatra jagmatus tau surottamau
GE09ram_01_u:3864: 1.074.019a jṛmbhitaṃ tad dhanur dṛṣṭvā śaivaṃ viṣṇuparākramaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3865: 1.074.019c adhikaṃ menire viṣṇuṃ devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tadā
GE09ram_01_u:3866: 1.074.020a dhanū rudras tu saṃkruddho videheṣu mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3868: 1.074.021a idaṃ ca viṣṇavaṃ rāma dhanuḥ parapuraṃjayam
GE09ram_01_u:3869: 1.074.021c ṛcīke bhārgave prādād viṣṇuḥ sa nyāsam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:3871: 1.074.022c pitur mama dadau divyaṃ jamadagner mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3873: 1.074.023c arjuno vidadhe mṛtyuṃ prākṛtāṃ buddhim āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3874: 1.074.024a vadham apratirūpaṃ tu pituḥ śrutvā sudāruṇam
GE09ram_01_u:3875: 1.074.024c kṣatram utsādayaṃ roṣāj jātaṃ jātam anekaśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3879: 1.074.026c śrutavān dhanuṣo bhedaṃ tato 'haṃ drutam āgataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3880: 1.074.027a tad idaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ rāma pitṛpaitāmahaṃ mahat
GE09ram_01_u:3883: 1.074.028c yadi śaknoṣi kākutstha dvandvaṃ dāsyāmi te tataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3884: 1.075.001a śrutvā taj jāmadagnyasya vākyaṃ dāśarathis tadā
GE09ram_01_u:3886: 1.075.002a śrutavān asmi yat karma kṛtavān asi bhārgava
GE09ram_01_u:3889: 1.075.003c avajānāmi me tejaḥ paśya me 'dya parākramam
GE09ram_01_u:3890: 1.075.004a ity uktvā rāghavaḥ kruddho bhārgavasya varāyudham
GE09ram_01_u:3892: 1.075.005a āropya sa dhanū rāmaḥ śaraṃ sajyaṃ cakāra ha
GE09ram_01_u:3893: 1.075.005c jāmadagnyaṃ tato rāmaṃ rāmaḥ kruddho 'bravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3895: 1.075.006c tasmāc chakto na te rāma moktuṃ prāṇaharaṃ śaram
GE09ram_01_u:3897: 1.075.007c lokān apratimān vāpi haniṣyāmi yad icchasi
GE09ram_01_u:3898: 1.075.008a na hy ayaṃ vaiṣṇavo divyaḥ śaraḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3903: 1.075.010c yakṣarākṣasanāgāś ca tad draṣṭuṃ mahad adbhutam
GE09ram_01_u:3907: 1.075.012c rāmaṃ kamala patrākṣaṃ mandaṃ mandam uvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:3908: 1.075.013a kāśyapāya mayā dattā yadā pūrvaṃ vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_01_u:3909: 1.075.013c viṣaye me na vastavyam iti māṃ kāśyapo 'bravīt
GE09ram_01_u:3910: 1.075.014a so 'haṃ guruvacaḥ kurvan pṛthivyāṃ na vase niśām
GE09ram_01_u:3911: 1.075.014c iti pratijñā kākutstha kṛtā vai kāśyapasya ha
GE09ram_01_u:3912: 1.075.015a tad imāṃ tvaṃ gatiṃ vīra hantuṃ nārhasi rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:3914: 1.075.016a lokās tv apratimā rāma nirjitās tapasā mayā
GE09ram_01_u:3915: 1.075.016c jahi tāñ śaramukhyena mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3920: 1.075.019a na ceyaṃ mama kākutstha vrīḍā bhavitum arhati
GE09ram_01_u:3922: 1.075.020a śaram apratimaṃ rāma moktum arhasi suvrata
GE09ram_01_u:3924: 1.075.021a tathā bruvati rāme tu jāmadagnye pratāpavān
GE09ram_01_u:3925: 1.075.021c rāmo dāśarathiḥ śrīmāṃś cikṣepa śaram uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:3926: 1.075.022a tato vitimirāḥ sarvā diśā copadiśas tathā
GE09ram_01_u:3928: 1.075.023a rāmaṃ dāśarathiṃ rāmo jāmadagnyaḥ praśasya ca
GE09ram_01_u:3930: 1.076.001a gate rāme praśāntātmā rāmo dāśarathir dhanuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3932: 1.076.002a abhivādya tato rāmo vasiṣṭha pramukhān ṛṣīn
GE09ram_01_u:3936: 1.076.004a rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā daśarathaḥ sutam
GE09ram_01_u:3938: 1.076.005a gato rāma iti śrutvā hṛṣṭaḥ pramudito nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3939: 1.076.005c codayām āsa tāṃ senāṃ jagāmāśu tataḥ purīm
GE09ram_01_u:3944: 1.076.008a kausalyā ca sumitrā ca kaikeyī ca sumadhyamā
GE09ram_01_u:3946: 1.076.009a tataḥ sītāṃ mahābhāgām ūrmilāṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_01_u:3951: 1.076.011c remire muditāḥ sarvā bhartṛbhiḥ sahitā rahaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3956: 1.076.014a rāmas tu sītayā sārdhaṃ vijahāra bahūn ṛtūn
GE09ram_01_u:3957: 1.076.014c manasvī tadgatas tasyā nityaṃ hṛdi samarpitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:3958: 1.076.015a priyā tu sītā rāmasya dārāḥ pitṛkṛtā iti
GE09ram_01_u:3959: 1.076.015c guṇād rūpaguṇāc cāpi prītir bhūyo vyavardhata
GE09ram_01_u:3960: 1.076.016a tasyāś ca bhartā dviguṇaṃ hṛdaye parivartate
GE09ram_01_u:3961: 1.076.016c antarjātam api vyaktam ākhyāti hṛdayaṃ hṛdā
GE09ram_01_u:3963: 1.076.017c devatābhiḥ samā rūpe sītā śrīr iva rūpiṇī
